description: Apple Bubbles is a bubble shooter type game with some unique features that you can't find in other similar games. The rules are simple: make groups of three or more apples of the same color to make them fall and then you have to catch them with the moveable base. === Main features === - Moveable base to shoot and catch the apples. - 2 game modes (classic and puzzle). - Three difficulty levels. - Level selector. - Colorblind option - Puzzle mode with 150 levels (with frequent updates to increase this number) - Special Apples (coin, multiplier, bomb, multi-color, freeze and elevator). - Local and online scores (Scoreloop service). - Full HD resolution for recent smartphones and tablet devices. If you like games like Space Bubbles (our previous game), Shoot Bubble, Bubble Shoot, Puzzle Bobble, Bubble Blast, Bubble Buster or Frozen Bubble then you have to try this one. If you have any problems with the game, please contact us to pconlinegamesmail@gmail.com Enjoy the game! PcOnline team PS: Don't forget to rate the game, your're opinion is very important to us.

Welcome to Automatic Call Recorder the #1 Call Recorder app on Google Play. Have you ever had an important phone call and needed to take a memo? Or you had to memorize a phone number or street address? You were in a traffic jam while receiving an important order from a client? Maybe you had to write down a shopping list and forgot something? Or simply wanted to hold on to some sweet memories and tender words from your soul mate? Automatic Call Recorder offers unique set of features which will allow you to record any call automatically. In addition to that you can simply shake your device during the call to start recording instantly. You can listen to the recorded call at any time in MP3 High Audio Quality or sync it with linked Dropbox account automatically. ********************************************************* Important notice about Automatic Call Recorder features: - Due to hardware limitations recording function might not work properly on some devices. It is not malfunction of the application, please do not leave negative reviews and comments. You can also try to fine-tune audio-source on the Automatic Call Recording setup page. - App may not function if other call recording applications are in use. Please close or delete all other recording apps. ********************************************************* Automatic Call Recorder - Full list of Features: • Automatic phone call recording based on predefined rules. • Crystal Clear MP3 Audio Quality • Shake to record (Premium option). Start recording any call instantly by shaking your device. • Recording Filter. You can choose between recording all calls, only calls made with your contacts or calls from unknown numbers. It is even possible to choose which contact from your contact list will be recorded or ignored. • Favorite calls list. Permanently stored calls that will not be deleted • Automatic Dropbox synchronization (Premium option). You can sync all calls or favorite calls automatically. • Manual Dropbox synchronization. You can choose to sync each recorded file separately. • Notifications. Once the recording has been started you can be notified either by notification icon or a sound. You can even choose which sound will be played (Premium). • After call action menu (Premium). This option is useful if you want to review each call and instantly delete the recording, write additional note or add it to favorites. • Advanced Memory Management. It is possible to limit the memory space occupied by the recorded files. You can choose between file number limit, space usage in Megabytes or Date of the recording (Premium). • Tested with major Samsung devices: Samsung Galaxy Series including Galaxy S Plus, Galaxy S2, Galaxy S3 and Galaxy S4 and Android Jelly Bean. ******************************************** Some of the features presented here are part of Premium version of the application. You can upgrade to premium using the Google Play in-app billing option. If you purchase the premium version you can enjoy the lifetime privileges of the premium version even if you reinstall the app, reset or change devices, simply by using the identical app store account to the one you have now. In the case that you have purchased the premium version by mistake for a device on which the app is known not to work, please send the receipt provided by Google by email to android@smsrobot.com and we will fully refund your purchase.

The best shooting game in this year is coming! ! ! It will bring you a different game experience! ! ! New graphics and smooth game control! ! ! Different game modes let you feel refreshed! ! ! Zombie Sniper 3D III is a very realistic first-person shooting game. Immersive 3D effects! Players need fight back the zombies. Just tap to aim at your target and tap fire icon to shoot bullets! When you use up bullets, you can tap load icon to reload bullets. In the game, you will meet many kinds of zombies, such as giant zombie, female zombie, and so on. You have to shoot 2 bullets to kill one zombie, but if you shoot its head you only need shoot 1 bullet. When you shoot zombie’s body, you can make it stop moving. Shoot round can to make it explode! If you have grenade or knife, you can damage zombie more heavily. Throw grenades to kill giant zombies! The levels in the game are changeable and varied. And there are special levels for you! Each time you kill a zombie, you can get coins. Collect coins to buy machine gun and rifle gun! If you like zombie-themed games, you can try this one! Features 1. Various zombies make the game more terrible! 2. Rich game scenes and multi-story buildings! Endless mode! 3. View of first-person makes you feel more immersive! 4. Players can change weapons in battlefield! 5. Zombie Sniper 3D III is more challenging and has all types of weapons! Bring you new game experience!

This app is the original best selling Flashlight with more than 10 million downloads on other platforms, now available on Android. You get a super fast flashlight that will stay on, and let you lock it on, as well as few other great tools. - A magnifier which lets you zoom in on items so you can see them better. You can also turn the light on if it is in a dark area. Take a snapshot of what you are looking at for review later, great for serial numbers on the back of equipment. - A carpenter level which comes in handy when you need to make sure something is straight.

This is a widget application for new parents to check their loved baby development counted on weekly basis. Every week, your baby will develop differently. This tool links with internet resources for the specific content for your baby. It also reminds the new parents for baby vaccine of that months. Curently, it shows only US vaccine schedule. To install the widget, click and hold the home screen-->Widget-->Baby Calendar First Year, on the configure page, please enter your baby name (optional), and birthday. It can also be used to count how many days the baby will be delivered if you have fill in the future birthday. Key Words: baby grow up in first year; new parents tool for baby development; baby vaccine schedule;

Make the frog jump from leaf to leaf faster each time, you'll need good reflexes and great skill. If you touch the water or you miss one leaf, you will lose . Each leaf accelerates the game, you have to be very concentrated. Get the highest score possible and upload it to the online ranking and prove you're the best. Playing is fun and easy, but mastering it is a challenge. Warning this game is extremely addictive. Jumping Frog is the most challenging and fun game you've ever seen, based on "do not tap the white tile".

Welcome to the swingin’, flyin’, gem collectin' world of Super Knights, an amazing new scoring game! When kidnapped princesses are in distress... when dangerous dragons, scary ghosts and ugly witches need to be fought... when the world is in peril and you need a hero... who are you going to call? The Super Knights! In a crazy medieval world, control one of the famous Super Knights and fill your pockets with the gems scattered throughout each level. Use your grappling hook to swing around the anchor points in the scenery. Addictive, colorful, and downright fun, Super Knights is the perfect slice of pick up and play gaming. Universally accessible, uniquely entertaining, simple in premise and yet with deep rewarding gameplay, it’s a real gem. **Runs beautifully on tablets**

description: Programa Escrutador para comprobar los aciertos en la Quiniela, dispone de las siguientes opciones: - Carga automático de los partidos que componen el boleto de la Quiniela de la Onlae - Seleccionar fichero de columnas (txt) para escrutar mediante el cómodo navegador del que dispone el programa. - Podremos ir marcando los resultados que se van produciendo y a continuación comprobar los aciertos obtenidos (muestra los aciertos desde el 14 al 10), visualizando las 5 columnas con más aciertos, de esa manera siempre sabemos qué opciones nos interesan para seguir manteniendo los premios. A partir de la versión 1.2, los aciertos se mostraran en verde, los errores en rojo - Guardar/Recuperar. En cualquier momento nos permite guardar el estado actual (fichero a escrutar, resultados marcados), para poder recuperarlo a posterior si cerramos la aplicación Teller program to check the hits in the Predictor, you have the following options: - Automatic loading of games that make up the ticket Predictor ONLAE - Select columns file (txt) to screen using the convenient browser available to the program. - We can check off the results that are produced and then check the correct answers (shown successes from 14 to 10), displaying the 5 columns with more hits, that way we always know what options we are interested to continue maintaining the prizes. From version 1.2, the hits will be shown in green, errors in red - Save / Recall. At any time we can save the current state (file to scrutinize, marked results) in order to retrieve it later if we close the application
release_text: Versión 1.5 (27/09/2014) - Se corrige posible error por tener ahora las columnas el pleno al 15 a goles Versión 1.2 (27/04/2014) - Los aciertos se muestran en verdes, los errores en rojos Versión 1.1 (02/03/2014) - Se pide permiso para leer en la SD. Hasta Android 4.3 no hacía falta. - En esta nueva versión desaparecen los problemas de los teléfonos sin SD

Secret agents everywhere, we have got an app for you. A utility like no other, SpyTOOLS offers 4 great ways to amaze and entertain your friends. Fully enabled for both English and Spanish, SpyTOOLS is equally useful for practical purposes, such as recording meetings, or protecting your valuables while you are not in the room. SpyTOOLS consists of: SpyMIC – Secretly activates recordings in 3 ways: by timer, volume level or detecting device movement using the accelerometer. SpyCAM – Can take individual pictures or a sequence of photos set by either a timer or sound detector set to a specific volume. SpyVIDEO – Use your smartphone to record secret movies so discretely and activated by timer, movement or automatic volumen detection. SpyFILES – Discreetly organizes your files, so if your device falls into the wrong hands, your secrets remain safe. SpyLOG - On Spylog all actions performed within the App will be registered. This information can be sent and shared as you prefer. SpyGPS – Creates a reliable tracking device, so users always know where their device is located. SpyDownload - Download your secret files from any device enabling your device as web server and connecting to its download website by wifi. SpyEncrypt - With SpyEncrypt you can encode a text for not anyone can read it. You can send it to a friend via SMS or email and you can decode a received coded text. If you have SpyTools installed on your device, when you receive an encoded email, with SpyTools you will be able to automatically open the encoded message without having to copy and paste the text. Note: SpyTOOLS is an application intended for entertainment purposes only and should not be used to invade other individual’s privacy without their consent. Remember: Don’t be evil!

description: A multilingual smart application intended for the learning and fast retention of foreign language words – learning through play. Select your favourite topical lesson and let the application work to teach you step by step all your required words. The full version currently contains more than 1300 words in 44 thematic lessons and their number continuously increases. The intelligent algorithm controls itself the whole learning process and recognises how well you translate the words. Accordingly, it shows new words or repeats additionally the older ones. Or they are included in “problematic words”. Problematic words are such words where you have the greatest lack of knowledge (the application will recognize them itself). They can be practiced individually or only went through later. A corresponding image for view and also a high-quality audio track, which will teach you the correct pronunciation, are included for each word as a matter of course. Other application options include e.g. the unlimited creation of user lessons, a well-arranged vocabulary or statistics which keep the previous achieved results. The Google Translate service, backing your own created data and other options are also available. Languages available (both application and learning): - English - German - Czech - Spanish - Italian and others are in preparation. Please try a free demo version with 3 test lessons. The full version is available here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=cz.android.easyWordsFull with more than 1300 words and 44 lessons. Do not hesitate to contact me if you find any error or have any suggestion how to improve it.

Dinosaurs are a diverse group of animals of Dinosauria. They first appeared during the Triassic period, 231.4 million years ago, and were the dominant terrestrial vertebrates for 135 million years, from the beginning of the Jurassic (about 201 million years ago) until the end of the Cretaceous (66 million years ago). Dinosaurs are represented on every continent by both extant species and fossil remains. Evidence suggests that egg laying and nest building are additional traits shared by all dinosaurs. While modern birds are generally small due to the constraints of flight, many prehistoric dinosaurs were large-bodied. Since the first dinosaur fossils were recognized in the early 19th century, mounted fossil dinosaur skeletons have been major attractions at museums around the world, and dinosaurs have become an enduring part of world culture. The large sizes of some groups, as well as their seemingly monstrous and fantastic nature, have ensured dinosaurs' regular appearance in best-selling books and films, such as Jurassic Park. The faces of Dino games provide many faces of ancient dinosaurs as platform for you to play the simple but interesting games of puzzle, block and memo games. Play the many faces of dino games and at the same time learn to recognise various species of the ancient animals. Game 1 : The faces of Dino is a simple puzzle game with several levels of difficulty. Game 2 : The Faces of Dino in a block games perfect for both adults and children. Change the block to fit each other! It is a 100 levels of block game.. Game 3 : The Faces of Dino memo games will test your memory skill to find the matching pictures Game 4 : Tetris Game Once you have started and complete the levels of each games, you will find it very enjoyable to play in a very relax atmosphere with educational background. I can assure you, you will love the games very much!!

description: The Mobile Travel Kit from Pacific Blue Cross is the must-have app for BC and Yukon residents who love to travel. Enjoy peace of mind knowing you have Pacific Blue Cross with you when you travel. Simply choose your desired plan, add trip cancellation and baggage insurance and enter your travel details to get an instant quote. Features of the Mobile Travel Kit: - Get quotes and purchase travel insurance from your mobile phone (British Columbia and Yukon residents only). - Store your policy on your phone while you travel so you can view your coverage and benefits under your plan. - Contact Pacific Blue Cross and/or Medi-Assist with the touch of a button in the event you experience an emergency while travelling. - Save personal profiles to make your next travel insurance purchase much faster and easier. - Keep track of your previous travel plan purchases. The Mobile Travel Kit also includes a First Aid Kit with information on common conditions that travellers face and what to do when you experience them. From insect bites to ankle sprains, the First Aid Kit will help you determine if you need to see a doctor or seek first aid. Good health and a safe trip are tough to guarantee, so enjoy peace of mind from a name trusted around the globe. Pacific Blue Cross Travel Insurance. Covers you, covers the world.

description: This application is a great game to test your mental abilities, your logic skills. You have several modes to try to beat high scores from other people. Tests consist in finding next number after a suite of numbers. You can be confronted to different types of logic suites, and it is up to you to think about the good answer. Try it, and you will become an addict for sure ! You have several modes to train your brain : - "10 tries" : the aim is to reach 10/10 as fast as possible. - "Survival" : really hard mode that let you find rach answer in less than 8 seconds without making a mistake. - "No limit" : you can play limitless ! - "50 tries" : the aim is to reach 50/50 as fast as possible. In addition, you can challenge your friends, and test if you are the best at logic suites. You have 15 coins when you begin, and you can earn more by challenging other players, or by playing survival mode (by reaching 50 and 100). Enjoy !

description: Swiss Radio includes the most popular UK radio stations in only one application. In one click, enjoy your favorite radio wherever you are through your internet connection (3g or wi-fi). Amongst the strengths of this application: - Swiss Radios runs in the background listening and allows you to do other activities whilst continuing to listen your favorite station - Its interface ergonomics is both intuitive and easy to use. In one click, you can select or change your station. - The continuous update of the stations list (without updating application) will ensure you a better quality and a greater reactivity to problem solving the available radio stations are : - La première (RTS1) - Espace (RTS2) - Couleur (RTS3) - Option Musique - SRF 1 - SRF 2 kultur - SRF 3 - SRF 4 news - SRF Virus - SRF Musikwelle - Neo eins - Neo zwei - RSI Rete Uno - RSI Rete Due - RSI Rete Tre - Radio 24 - Swiss Jazz - Swiss Classic - Swiss Pop - Energy Swiss - Lausanne FM - Rouge FM - Radio Rumantsch - Kaiseregg - Radio Rottu - Canal 3 Fr - Canal 3 De Warning : this application requires an Internet connection and depends on the radio broadcast. Some stations can be temporarily unavailable

Every house has its secrets - some of them in broad daylight, some are hidden somewhat better in the shadows. This wonderful hidden object game gives you the unique opportunity to find amazing life-like items in different rooms of a mysterious suburban house. Choose among three level difficulties: - CASUAL - No time limit and quick hint. All modes available for each unlocked level! - NORMAL - Time limit and slower hint. Each use of hint costs 2 seconds. Only those modes you've played in the previous level are available in the next one. - EXPERT - Bonus mode for those who got all stars on all levels in either CASUAL or NORMAL mode. Each scene can be completed in three search modes: - By PICTURE - By WORD - By SILHOUETTE Complete each of them on the scene to get three stars! Go back to previous levels to get a better score and unlock the next section! Features: - Clever fun to solve hidden object scenes - Item search by word or by pictures and by silhouette - Inspiring artwork in realistic locations - 3 difficulty levels and unlockable content *Powered by Dolby® on supported devices* Enjoy the full game for FREE! *There is another version you can buy for $.99 if you would like to play without any ads. Everything is the same except the ads are removed.

Unbelievable coupon savings at your favorite stores, restaurants & gas stations - coupons always at your fingertips, everywhere you go! ============================= WHAT IS THIS VERSION? ============================= "The Coupons App Offers" is a working test build being bug tested before implementation within the standard & FREE "The Coupons App", our popular app found on this market. This feature-packed upgrade enables full functionality of the premium features by way of displaying relevant sponsored coupon "offers" (not ads). The offers are periodically presented in an unobtrusive fashion and are essentially coupons targeted specifically for users of the app. As they are sponsored coupons, we in turn removed the lack of functionality while still maintaining a roof overhead to code all the amazing new features about to go live. Expect a brief period for users to test this "The Coupons App Offers" version at which time the app will be merged into the current stable version (again found FREE here on the market)! Please do not uninstall the other version of The Coupons App as it is needed during testing of this new version. You will find an icon for this new version of the app titled "(Coupons)", while the stable version is just titled "Coupons" in your app drawer with our familiar price tag icon for both. Please email the developer with any bugs or issues you may experience and be sure to include the model phone/tablet you have this app installed. Thanks! ======================== Start original app description below: ======================== The Coupons App features: *Coupon WIDGET - Real-time coupons throughout your day. *BARCODE scanner - Price comparison shopping tool. *SHARE Coupon - Text & email coupons, Twitter coupons, even coupon sharing onto Facebook! *VOICE search coupons - Fast, easy and hands-free coupon and product searching means it is now even easier to find exactly what you want at the lowest price available. *SAVE Coupons - Coupon to calendar, one-tap maps navigate you to the nearest venue, phone the nearest location shown in each coupon and much more! Coupons continuously update throughout each day, it's like a fresh coupon buffet at your fingertips! Place the coupon widget onto your home screen and preview coupons instantly as they become available. SMS Text coupon - sharing of coupons with any phone. You may even text each coupon to older analog phones without the Coupons App installed & on other carriers! Search coupons - Coupon searching even while you stand in the store checkout line. Redeeming coupons from The Coupons App is easy! Simply display coupon on your phone to cashier.

description: Patchwork Puzzle is similar to a jigsaw puzzle but with square pieces. A picture is broken into squares that are then jumbled. Select two squares to switch their positions. Continue until the puzzle is solved. Points are scored for the number of pieces moved to their correct position. Puzzles with more pieces are easier but you cannot score as many points. Scoring: No pieces in correct location: -1 points One piece in correct location: 2 points Two pieces in correct location: 8 points

You are Krumb, a dwarven pitman with the quest for mighty artifacts. On your journey through mysterious mines, swamps and dungeons you will encounter many dangerous enemies, from the malicious cave goblins to the enormous trolls. Drink from health fountains, open treasure chests, collect a wide range of food, weapons and magical items and use them wisely - to eventually stand your ground against the perils that await you! Initially made for the "Seven Day Roguelike Challenge" the game got a complete overhaul. Pitman will let you die a thousand deaths ... and make your survival especially satisfying! Features: * RPG - create the hero you want, like a dwarven sorcerer or a powerful warrior * turnbased - for a tactical course of action * 3D boardgame style - build the world while playing * randombased - no game will be like the one before If you have any bug reports, please don't hesitate to mail us (click on "Pitman Support" and select one of the E-Mail addresses), and tell us the circumstances of your problem.

description: TinyScan Pro - The little app that scans everything * Scan documents, photos, receipts, or just about anything * Lightning fast and gorgeously designed for both phone and tablet IS THAT A SCANNER IN YOUR POCKET? TinyScan turns your device into a pdf portable scanner. Scans are saved to your phone as images or PDFs. Name and organize your scans into folders, or share them by: - Email - Dropbox, Evernote, Google Drive, or Box - Wifi directly to your computer TinyScan has all the BIG features you need: * Scan in color, grayscale, or black & white * Page edges are detected automagically * 5 levels of contrast for crisp monochrome texts * Set page sizes for PDF (Letter, Legal, A4, and more) * Thumbnail or list view, sort scans by date or title * Quick search by document title * Protect your documents with a passcode * Universal – a single app that works on phone and tablet too! GOT QUESTIONS? CAN'T FIGURE OUT HOW TO DO SOMETHING? Please email us at tinyscan.a@appxy.com , and we’ll help you figure it out. Follow us on Twitter: @Appxy_official Like us on Facebook: Appxy Follow us on Google+: Appxy

description: Embark on a journey through magical dream landscapes, as imagined by best-selling artist Phatpuppy. Sweet Dreams contains beautiful levels, full of dreamy scenes and hidden items to uncover. Three different modes of play: NORMAL Mode - Timed, limited hints and exciting bonus rounds! CASUAL Mode - A nice and relaxing experience. CHALLENGE Mode - An extra challenge for those willing to accept it! Four ways to find items: Find by PICTURE - discover the items with a list of pictures! Find by SILHOUETTE - find the items using only their silhouettes! Find by WORD - a list of words is what you get to find each item in the scene! Find by RANDOM - A random selection of the above modes for an extra challenge! Experienced players can select a "Hard" hiding mode where items are partially blended into the scene. For beginners, a training mode and hints are included. We have you covered no matter your skill level! Sweet Dreams!

One of the best document (Pdf, fb2, DJVU, etc.) viewer for Android. If you are looking for a good PDF or EPUB reader, stop here, you have found it. EBook Reader is a highly customizable document viewer. It's optimized for Android devices. EBook Reader supports the following ebook and document formats: DjVU, PDF, XPS (OpenXPS), FictionBook (fb2 and fb2.zip), Comics Book formats (cbr and cbz), plus - starting with version 2.0 - EPUB and RTF. Key Features: - Bookshelf view - Recent Books - Book search results - File Browser,File navigation - Search text in book - Night Mode - Auto fit your page view - Links History, back to page - Search all books (PDF, DjVu) on device - Scroll pages by finger tap on screen - Full screen mode - Light theme and black theme - Set screen orientation: Portrait, Landscape, Automatic - Bookmarks on page - Cut white document borders - Fixate pages by width, page will not move from right to left - Book and Page Thumbnails - Configurable search directories EBook Reader allows you to customize the way you read on a per book basis: each document's layout can be tailored to give you the best reading experience and all settings will be remembered the next time you will open it. Whatever your document, be it a two-faced xerox, a book with wide asymmetric margins or a multi-column article, EBook Reader provides you with features to split pages, automatically or manually crop margins and instantly zoom to a column's content. Please note: EBook Reader uses MIME types to handle different file types. Unfortunately, Android's and many other file managers might not support all MIME types. When this happens, you will not be able to open said files directly from the file manager. Some file managers allow you to add new MIME types and associate them with the corresponding file extensions. Refer to your file manager manual to get further instructions on how to do that. ------------------ Disclaimer： This app is base on the Old versions (up to 1.6.x) EbookDroid code, and licensed under the under the GPLv3+. GNU General Public License: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/ Source Code: https://github.com/FunPanda08/EBook-Reader-for-android

Ragdoll Boxing 3D NOTE: Please take note that this is a BETA project, meaning it's incomplete so don't expect fight night just yet. I am also aware of a few bugs and missing features which will be fixed/added when I get the time (see list at the bottom). This game is under constant development so if you have any sweet ideas about what you want to see, let me know - I don't bite! Features: - 3D graphics. - Dynamic AI which tries to learn from your play style. - Career mode (Still in development). - 100% physics fighting/movement, no pre-made static animations. - Customizable boxer. - Boxing simulation. Ragdoll boxing 3D is a sports boxing game which uses real physics instead of pre-made animations, this leads to interesting movements which aren't the same every time. The feet actually balance the ragdoll in place instead of being there for aesthetic purposes, the ragdoll will lose more balance as it becomes more injured/tired (this feature is currently out of the game for the moment). It's still in early stages but new improvements are made often.. Check out the video if you are interested, or check out my blog to follow the development. Instructions:- - When you first begin the game you will have to make a boxer, move the sliders to customise the look of your boxer and input your info. - Press proceed to advance the date. - Sign contract will look for boxers with similar stats, press sign to sign a fight with that boxer. - Press proceed until you can fight. - When in the game, use the virtual analogue stick to move around, the two fist icons in the right bottom corner to punch, the two fist icon will block, hold down the down button whilst punching to aim for the torso, the bendy arrow button dodges opponent punches. - Happy boxing! Known Issues / Features in development: - Cash is somewhat useless at the moment. - Stamina is pretty much infinite. - Boxer stats don't carry on between rounds. - GUI scaling problems between certain devices. - Missing options/settings menu's. - Rank screen doesn't properly rank boxers. - Training menu is incomplete. - Occasionally arms will spasm out for half a second. - Stats menu is incomplete. - Shop to buy new gloves, shorts etc.. - Tournaments. - Different weight classes. - Visible body damage. This is built on the Unity3d engine.
release_text: New in 0.98 Please note this is incompatible with the last version, as most of the code has been re-written. If you are updating it's recommended that you either clear the data of the app (through settings/apps) or re-install it. ~ New real boxer models! ~ Boxer glove, short models. ~ Boxing ring model. ~ Improved punching dynamics. ~ Improved walking system. ~ Conversion to Unity5 (bringing PhysX 3.3) ~ Different stats. ~ Many bug fixes and optimizations. ~ AI improvements. ~ Positional damage

A handy calculator to determine the new coordinates of a point using a known distance and bearing. Something that is used on a daily basis by site setting out engineers/land surveyors now available on your phone or tablet. So if your pre-programmed calculator has run out of battery or fallen in a puddle or you just left it at home you can still work away as if you had your trusty calculator. All responsibility for checking results lie with the engineer/surveyor and we cannot accept responsibility for any errors. Obviously! Enjoy! More to come such as global grid to local grid converter.

description: Hi kids! Do you want to help the wounded and sick animals in the ocean? Be the doctor of the sea and drive in the underwater ambulance. Help the sick and injured sea animals. Your patients are a shark, a whale and a swordfish. Help the doctor to make them better. Features of Ocean animals ambulance doctor ♦ Help the animal patients: a whale, a shark and a swordfish ♦ Be a dentist for the whale ♦ Easy to play for kids ♦ 3 levels of fun ♦ No in-app purchases, so really free game The sea turtle is the doctor in this ocean amials game. Help the sea turtle with his underwater patients. The shark is wounded by a ship wreck. He have an injury with a little bit blood. You also need to use the x-ray for the shark. The doctor will bandage him. Your second patient is the swordfish, he is sick and injured. He has a blood wound from a hook and his sword is damaged. Take care of the injury. Your last and biggest patient is the whale. First be an dentist and brush his dirty teeth. Find the broken ribs and then help the doctor to clean his stomach. The whale is sick of all the bad food that’s in the sea. Then the animal doctor is finished for today in the sea live. Ocean animals ambulance doctor is a game from Top Girl games and one of the best free sea animal doctor games, we publish many different easy to play girl game apps. We hope you will enjoy our Ocean animals ambulance doctor game and we hope you give us the love by liking our Facebook page or follow us on twitter. So we can keep you up to date on our girl games, hospital and sea animal kids games. ♥ Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/LadiesDressUp ♥ Twitter - https://twitter.com/ladiesdressup

Real Racing 3 is an award-winning franchise that sets a new standard for mobile racing games – it really must be experienced to be believed. Real Racing 3 features a continuously expanding roster of officially licensed tracks, a 22-car grid, and over 100 meticulously detailed cars from manufacturers like Ferrari, Porsche, Chevrolet, Lamborghini, Mercedes-Benz, Bugatti, and Audi. Plus Real-Time Multiplayer, Social Leaderboards, Time Trials, Ghost Challenges, and innovative Time Shifted Multiplayer™ (TSM) technology, allowing you to race anyone, anytime, anywhere. This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings. **This is a resource-intensive game featuring extremely high quality visuals. Please make sure you have at least 1.5GB of free space on your device. ** REAL CARS Take the wheel of over 100 intensely detailed vehicles from iconic manufacturers like Ford, Aston Martin, McLaren, Koenigsegg and Pagani, and test your skills on an authentic 22-car race grid – the most epic racing experience on any handheld. REAL TRACKS Burn rubber on a full lineup of 12 real tracks in multiple configurations from top worldwide locations, including Silverstone, Hockenheimring, Circuit des 24 heures du Mans, Dubai Autodrome and many more. REAL PEOPLE Get bumper to bumper with friends and rivals in global 8-player, cross-platform, real-time racing with drafting. When your friends and rivals aren’t there, drop into any race to challenge their AI-controlled versions in Time-Shifted Multiplayer™. MORE CHOICES THAN EVER Compete in over 2000 events, including Cup races, Eliminations, Endurance challenges, and Drag Races. Choose from a diverse range of upgrades to maximize your car’s performance. Customize your car with a broad variety of paints, vinyls and rims. View the action from a variety of camera angles, tweak the HUD and fine-tune the controls to your personal preference. THE PREMIER RACING EXPERIENCE Powered by the remarkable Mint™ 3 Engine, Real Racing 3 features detailed car damage, fully functioning rear view mirrors, and dynamic reflections for truly HD racing. Enjoy a rich, next-gen game with the most advanced cross-platform social and competitive racing community ever. Real Racing 3 delivers it all and pushes the boundaries with every update. Welcome to the definitive racing experience for everyone, everywhere. ___ Real Racing 3 is always receiving support for new devices, check out the most recent additions here >> bit.ly/RR3DeviceSupport Terms of Service: http://www.ea.com/terms-of-service Privacy and Cookie Policy: http://www.ea.com/privacy-policy Game EULA: http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/GM/ Visit https://help.ea.com/ for assistance or inquiries. EA may retire online features and services after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates Important Consumer Information: This app: requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply); requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy, TOS and EULA includes in-game advertising; collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details); contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13.

History storage and detection, follow-back, etc. new followers, of remove can be done on the tool. Also, because of the possible to the background run on a regular basis every day, it is possible to evolve new follow at one-day intervals, the history of the unfollow without launching the app. ■ Function It also has the following functions. • Multiple user login (OAuth) And mutual follow user display User display that you're following User display that is follow And new follow user display And new unfollow user display Access to Twitter from the user display Access to the user Web page from the user display Access to the user display from favstar And follow-up from the user display Follow released from the user display Block from the user display · History save new follow, follow-release Export in HTML data - Backup and restore to the SD of data · Automatic Updates of specifying the time And follow-up of any user of the acquired, follower status display · Follow common between users of any previously retrieved common follower extract and display [Search for Keyword] You're No Yuku left Roman Kore, Forokore, this Roman, Twitter, follow, followers, Pochitta, pochitter, thus hole, element, personnel Tta
release_text: Ver 1.82 ・バックグラウンド更新が失敗する不具合を修正しました。 Ver 1.81 ・フォロー、アンフォロー、ブロックでの通信エラーを修正しました。 Ver 1.80 ・作成時期が新しいユーザーで通信エラーが発生する不具合を修正しました。 ・解像度の高い端末で画像が小さく表示される現象を修正しました。 Ver 1.72 ・Twitter API仕様変更により通信エラーが発生したいた問題に対応しました。 Ver 1.71 ・連続してブロック、アンフォローできない不具合を修正しました。 Ver 1.70 ・ブロックしているユーザ一覧の表示に対応しました。 Ver 1.65 ・アンフォロー、ブロック時に確認ダイアログを表示するようにしました。 Ver 1.64 ・Twitter API 1.0の廃止によりTwitter API 1.1へ移行しました。これに伴い取得できるユーザー数が最大約35000人(1時間毎に回復)から最大約18000人(15分毎に回復)に減少しております。 ・通信エラーが発生する場合はログイン画面より再度「新規ユーザ登録」を行ってください。

description: Make your telephone or tablet speak to you with Voxygen’s Best-of-Vox Voices. The Electra voice reads aloud any French text. Get rid of flat voices with no expression or personality! Discover Natural and Fun Voices, and listen to a sample here: http://www.best-of-vox.com/android . Follow us on Twitter http://twitter.com/VoxygenSAS to keep up with new voices! Like us on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/voxygen.fr ★ What is it for? Various ways to use Best-of-Vox voices: voice guidance, E-books and SMS reading, ring tones, alarm clocks, Android accessibility features with Talkback and much more. Share your messages from the Best-of-Vox application on your preferred social networks: SoundCloud, WhatsApp, Skype, hubiC, Evernote, Drive, etc. ★ How does it work? The Best-of-Vox application allows you to type or paste text and to have it read out aloud by the voice that you have chosen. You can then save it as a ringtone or share it with your friends on SoundCloud ! From your emails, your Internet browser, or any compatible application, select some text and make your Best-of-Vox voice read it aloud by simply clicking on the “share” menu. ★ How to install it? Only 2 clicks to activate the Best-of-Vox voice in the Android settings that you reach from the application's main menu. Watch the installation video and follow the instructions. Please note: with Android versions prior to 4.0, one additional first click is required at the bottom of the settings list in order to activate the voice. ★ How to fix an occasional problem? – Cannot hear the Best-of-Vox: First ensure that the volume of your device is sufficient. If this is the case, than it may be that the voice's data was corrupted during or after its installation. In order to reinitiate the voice, please perform the following steps: go to “Android Settings / Applications / Manage applications / Best-of-Vox voice”, click on “Force stop”, click on “Clear data”, return to the home screen, ensure that the device is connected to a Wi-Fi network (which is required to download the data), restart the Best-of-Vox application, wait for the download and data preparation to be fully completed, enter some text and click on the “play” button. Questions? Please contact android@voxygen.fr . Credits: Moteur de synthèse vocale / Voix de synthèse / Synthèse vocale / Speech synthesis / TTS / tts / Text To Speech / Texttospeech / Speech synthesis engine / TTS engine / Synthetic voice / TTS voice : http://www.best-of-vox.com/android

CCTV Design Tool is new and will be rapidly updated soon to include floor map imports, and FOV selectors using trigonometric routines and displays. You can use the current utilities to calculate any HD IP CCTV item that you need from lens selection and IR illumination calculating to storage, bandwidth and RAID storage calculating. This is the free version which allows you to use all of the CCTV design calculators. You cannot create a project or scenes with this version, you need to purchase the full version for that. This app includes these calculators/utilities: > lens calculator > storage calculator > bandwidth calculator > ohms law & power calculator > voltage drop calculator > conduit fill calculator (per NECA) > RAID storage calculator > IR illuminator light distance calculator > Ping test tool > Camera Connect tool This app also includes RJ45 terminations and pinout diagrams. Please leave notes, comments or suggestions on what other calculators you might want to see added, or changed to make them more useful.

Wind-up Knight by Robot Invader is a high-end, action-packed, 3D side-scrolling adventure game, and it's here to show you how games are supposed to be played. Guide your Wind-up Knight through devilish levels--over 50 in all--to rescue the Princess from the clutches of the evil Black Knight. Run, jump, roll, and slash your way to victory. Not your typical runner game, Wind-up Knight is the type of challenging game you've been missing in your life. Here are some bullet points all up in your grill: • Over 50 soul-crushing levels in four unique worlds. • Intense platforming action: double jumping, wall sliding, dive and roll, just to name a few cool moves. • Achievements, mega-hard "knightmare" levels, and full controller support, including MOGA! • New weapons and armor unlock as you play the game. Use the Armory to equip items and customize your character! • Original soundtrack by Josh Whelchel. Wind-up Knight has been designed from the ground up by Robot Invader to provide a console-level experience for your Android device. The Princess hasn't got all day, download it now! Note: if you are mega awesome it is possible to unlock all the levels in this game for free. If you prefer to pay a few bucks to unlock levels, that's cool too. However, some purchases are not transferrable across devices, will be lost forever if you uninstall or wipe your phone, and are non-refundable. _______________________ Wind-up Knight is AppliGet's 2011 Android App of the Year! "A success story from start to finish." - Tara Long, DESTRUCTOID "4/4 - Must Have" - SLIDE TO PLAY "5/5 - Great" - APPSPY

Although they can be brief, dust storms can also be deadly! Every year, drivers and their passengers die when caught in a dust storm because they did not follow appropriate safety measures. The Dust Storm app provides drivers with up-to-date weather alerts, air quality alerts, tips and suggestions if they find themselves caught in a dust storm or if one is approaching. Features: •Quick Safety Tips for coping with a dust storm •Places to list emergency contact numbers, toll-free highway information numbers, and insurance policy information •Weather maps •Access to alerts •Items for a dust storm survival kit in your car •Share this app with others Produced by Arizona Cooperative Extension, an outreach arm of the University of Arizona and the College of Agriculture and Life Sciences.

C++ made Easy! Now C++ learning tutorial in your hand, no need to carry textbook for C++ programming language. This application will explore the whole concept of C++ language. It is very simple to use. An application that empowers its users to learn the basics and clear the fundamentals of one of the most popular programming language “The C++ language”. The purpose of this tutorial is to give a good understanding of the programming language C++. Learn C++ right over your Android phone or tablet with this great app. This FREE app was made for the learner's convenience and is a supplement to schools, teachers and students who like to use their Android devices to learn. Chapter wise categorization of contents is given in this app. This app covers all the basic fundamentals of C++ and plays a vital role in mastering C++ language. Detailed elaboration of each topic helps students to understand every aspect of C++ language and gain sound knowledge of programming in C++ language. C++ is regarded as an intermediate-level language, as it comprises a combination of both high-level and low-level language features. It was developed by Bjarne Stroustrup starting in 1979 at Bell Labs as an enhancement to the C language. Originally named C with Classes, the language was renamed C++ in 1983. C++ has greatly influenced many other popular programming languages, most notably C# and Java. The language began as enhancement to C, first adding classes, then virtual functions, operator overloading, multiple inheritance, templates, and exception handling among other features. After years of development, the C++ programming language standard was ratified in 1998 as ISO/IEC 14882:1998. The standard was modified by the 2003, ISO/IEC 14882:2003. The current standard extending C++ with new features was ratified and published by ISO in September 2011 as ISO/IEC 14882:2011 (informally known as C++11). Contents: 1. Introducing to the C++ Language. 2. Classes and Objects. 3. Arrays, Pointers, References and the Dynamic Allocation Operators. 4. Function Overloading, Copy Constructors and Default. 5. Overloading, Operator Overloading. 6. Inheritance 7. Polymorphism and Virtual function 8. Template 9. Exception Handling. This app comes as a blessing for the students of B.E (computers/IT), B.C.A., B.Sc.(computers) and all others for whom learning C++ is a real challenge. Keywords: C, C++, Cpp, C plus plus, C++ language, Cpp language, C plus plus language, C++ basics.

description: Free Paycheck Calculator provides you with the most accurate calculation of your net payroll check, that you will find on the market. Version 3.0 - Update for payroll tax calculation for year 2015. Version 2.4 - Update for payroll tax calculation for year 2014. Version 2.3: - Update for payroll tax calculation for year 2013. New in version 2.1: - Update for year 2012 New in version 2.0: - Federal and State Deductions to account for dependants for most accurate paycheck calculation! Paycheck Free calculates net pay amount and applicable payroll taxes: - Federal Withholding, - Social Security, - Medicare, - State Withholding, - State Disability (where applicable), - State Unemployment Insurance (where applicable). Paycheck Free allows to email your paycheck details to employer, employee or anybody else. Produced paycheck calculation is a professional grade payroll calculator, that takes into account Federal and State exemptions (meaning dependants) Paycheck Free displays ads and is limited to 20 daily paycheck calculations. If you want to have unlimited calculations please upgrade to Paycheck Calc. If you need the most accurate and professional payroll calculation, plus an ability to enter Pre-tax and After-tax calculations, and save different profiles (for different states or employees) then please upgrade to Payroll Guru app. You can use free Paycheck Calculator to compare your calculations to the actual paycheck that you receive, and you can email your payroll service provider in case of a large discrepancy in the amounts. Also, you can use Paycheck Free as a tool to compare take amounts and taxes in different states, which may be especially useful if you consider relocation and employment in a different state. Free paycheck calculator will calculate taxes for all 50 states and District of Columbia. Enjoy it and please rate it if you like it. If you don't like - tell us what you didn't like (by email support@payrollguru.mobi ) and we will try to fix it. Please don't slam our ratings for nothing. Thanks so much and we hope you will enjoy our app!!!

Popular puzzle game that came from the nineteenth century. We will collect the pyramid of the figures of the same color and at the same time to use the least amount of moves. An interesting modification of the classical Towers of Hanoi task. How to play: - Grab the figure and move it to the available space. - In one step it is allowed to move only one figure. - Do not place a larger figure on a smaller one and figures of the same size on each other. - You can build a pyramid of figures of different colors. - It is impossible to put figures on destroyed pedestals. Features: The difference from the classical Towers of Hanoi task is the fact that at different levels we will use a different number of pieces (depending on complexity) and different number of pedestals: 3 to 5. The game is to go through the levels, the task in which become more complicated as they pass. After completing each level the player is rewarded with points and coins. Points positioned player in the overall league table. Coins can be spent on tricks that will help to pass the level with the best result. Only 1 person of 1000 can pass the last level and get the gold medal! Maybe that's you this genius? Let's play!

Always stay connected to the battlefield with the Battlelog app for Android phones and tablets. It contains all the features you need to stay on top of the game. Check your stats, see what’s next to unlock, view the results from your matches, challenge your friends to Missions, customize your Loadout and see how you’re doing in the Geo Leaderboards. Battlelog even connects to Battlefield™ 4 while you’re playing the game! Now you can find the server you want to play on or join a friend directly from the Battlelog app with Remote Joining. You can also customize your Loadout in real-time while you’re playing, and on tablet you can even use BattleScreen to get a fullscreen, real-time minimap of the game you’re playing. You can also connect with friends and the Battlefield™ community. Write updates to your feed, read all the latest news and join other passionate fans in the forums. With Battlelog you will always have the battlefield with you. Battlelog Features: • SOLDIER STATS & PROGRESSION – View the progress and stats of your soldier to see how far you are from your next rank, how many kills you’ve gotten, and which weapon is your best. • LOADOUT – Customize your soldier’s Loadout wherever you are, and you can even update from the app in real-time while you’re playing. • SUGGESTIONS & TRACKING – Get suggestions for new awards and unlocks to pursue, or find that special weapon you’re after and track it so you can follow its progression. • BATTLE REPORTS – View detailed stats of your past games to inspect your strengths and weakness, and share the reports to your feed for extra bragging rights. • MULTIPLAYER & REMOTE JOIN – View and find servers directly in the app, and join your friends or favorite servers remotely when you’re playing. • BATTLESCREEN* - View the minimap in fullscreen and real-time on your tablet, while you’re playing. As squad leader you can even set new orders directly from the app. • LEADERBOARDS – Choose your location and see how you stack up against friends, your city, your country and the world across a wide range of stats. • MISSIONS – Challenge your friends to custom Missions to see who can get the most kills in a round or be the best tank destroyer. • CAMPAIGN – View your campaign progression, check your stats and see how many points you’ve collected compared to your friends. • FORUMS – Share your passion for Battlefield™ with the rest of the community in the forums. • BATTLE FEED – Stay in touch with your friends’ Battlefield™ progression and share your stories with them. • COM CENTER – See when your friends are online and are playing Battlefield™ and get quick access to their profile and stats. • NEWS – Stay up-to-date with the latest Battlefield™ news from anywhere in the world. • PREMIUM – See what releases and drops are coming up for Premium members. Supported Games: • Battlefield™ 4 • Battlefield™ 3 *Tablet app only
release_text: Synced with the latest game data from Battlefield Hardline Fixed bugs reported since the Battlefield Hardline release

description: You can solve puzzles containing puctures or randomly generated puzzles. Supports all grid sizes from 2x2 up to 50x50. 10 difficulty levels. Unlimited number of random grids. Images are encoded as numbers located to the left of rows and above columns. These numbers indicate how many groups of black squares (or squares of other color if you are solving color nonograms) are located in the corresponding row or column, and also how many squares each group contains (for example, numbers 4, 1, 3 indicate that a line has three groups containing four, one, and three filled squares respectively). These groups should be separated with at least one blank square (you should keep in mind that blank squares can be located at the ends of a line). Your aim is to determine where groups of filled squares should be located.

description: ★★★★★ This app gives you an invaluable tool for mastering the guitar fretboard anywhere! Come join over 1,000,000 musicians of all skill levels and see why they can't stop playing Fretboard Addict for learning & practicing acoustic guitar fretboard notes, positions, ear training, and sight reading. You will improve your skills by using the app just 5 minutes a day and then applying the knowledge to your real instrument. There is nothing else like this!!! ★★★★★ ✔ WE'VE BEEN FEATURED IN: • IK Multimedia's iKlip App of the Week • Premier Guitar and PDA Essentials Magazines • iTunes App Store Top Paid, Top Grossing, What's Hot, and New & Noteworthy areas ✔ WHAT USERS ARE SAYING: ★★★★★ "I am a guitar teacher and this app is great for learning the notes on the strings - able to customize very well for quizzing yourself or your students!!" ★★★★★ "This is a well thought out app that is teaching me the fretboard while on vacation from my guitar. The best learning tool that I've yet to encounter for this purpose." ★★★★★ "Easy to use and I'm finally learning the notes on the fretboard. 5 minutes a day, that's all it takes. Well worth the small investment!" ✔ CHECK OUT A DEMONSTRATION VIDEO AT: www.guitaraddict.net ✔ SIMPLE AND EFFECTIVE ON YOUR ANDROID PHONE OR TABLET: Easy to use, no fretboard scrolling, and real instrument sounds ✔ CREATE YOUR OWN CUSTOM EXERCISES: • Configure the fretboard the way you want it! Simply touch the fretboard to select notes to work on or use the convenient presets • Learn the fretboard forwards, backwards, randomly, vertically, and horizontally • English (C D E F G A B) or Romance (Do Re Mi Fa Sol La Si) Syllables • Right and Left Handed Options • Smart learning engine that keeps track of your incorrect answers and gives you the best next round • Configure Sharps or Flats • Configure whether the answer is shown and/or notation is shown when you want to challenge yourself further. ✔ LEARN NOTES: Master fretboard notes intelligently with fretboard note exercises that you create. Learning the fretboard notes is fundamental to understanding chords. ✔ LEARN FRETBOARD POSITIONS: Master fretboard movement by practicing and recognizing fretboard note positions. This will give you the confidence and the mental training for playing notes and chords all over the fretboard. ✔ LEARN 11 MUSICAL KEYS: Gain an understanding of the circle of fifths and learn the notes in 11 major musical keys. This will help you to pick up and play a song with ease! ✔ LEARN EAR TRAINING: Improve your ability to improvise and play by ear with ear training exercises for notes ✔ LEARN SIGHT READING: Practice reading music notation which will help you read sheet music and gain an understanding of how pitch relates to the fretboard notes ✔MONITOR YOUR PROGRESS: Simple color coded statistics show you where you are strong and weak on the fretboard. This is a great way to know where to adjust your practice routines. This FREE version gives you a fully functional app limited to the first 3 frets. Please purchase the full version to access all 12 frets. Thank you for supporting our products!

description: The Translink Journey Planner provides information about all scheduled Metro, Ulsterbus, Goldline, NIRailways and Enterprise services. The journey planner has been designed to make finding out about public transport as easy as possible. You can plan journeys to and from stations/ stops/ address or postcode/ neighbourhood or, point of interest as well as create bespoke timetables for your service or preferred stop. The app and mobile site enable you to plan journeys from your current location. Features include: - Interactive and fully integrated Trip Planner - Full coverage of N Ireland bus and rail services - Dynamic zoom and scroll mapping - GPS using “my location” - Departure board of services from your point of origin - Updating maps “on the go” - Saves favourite locations and recent journeys - Email and In calendar functions We welcome your feedback about this app, to send us an email please click the “info” button on your phone and follow the link.

description: POLARIS Office for Good is an enterprise application and not meant for consumer use. This application requires that Good Dynamics servers are setup in your Company’s IT organization. POLARIS Office for Good is a Mobile Office application that allows Good Dynamics users to view/edit Microsoft Office (Word, Excel and PowerPoint) documents on Smartphone and Tablet. Users can view/edit text files and view .pdf and .hwp files as well. POLARIS Office’s excellent rendering quality shows all the texts, charts, pictures and etc. of the documents made with Microsoft Office on a PC as the original itself without any losses. Now, you can safely and conveniently view/edit important documents on your Mobile devices. ■ Key Features of POLARIS Office for Good View and edit Microsoft Office documents / View .pdf and .hwp files / Support Quick Scroll / Support around 80 types of Smart Arts & 18 types 2D, 3D charts / Provide more than 300 editing features / Useful & various templates for new creation / Slideshow mode / Page transition effects for slide shows / Pointer and drawing for slideshows ■ Advantages of POLARIS Office for Good View and edit various document types / Excellent compatibility with Microsoft Office documents / Fast document loading speed / Fabulous Presentation at anytime and anyplace / Powerful security with Good Dynamics ■ Supported Formats Edit (doc/docx, xls/xlsx, ppt/pptx, txt) / View (pdf, hwp)

description: Contam a história do mundo desde quando Deus começou a criar, até os nossos dias. Falam até mesmo sobre o que Deus promete fazer no futuro. Há 116 histórias neste livro. Elas são agrupadas em oito partes. Uma página, no começo de cada parte, diz em poucas palavras o que se encontra nela. As histórias são contadas na ordem em que os acontecimentos ocorreram. Isto lhe ajudará a saber quando as coisas aconteceram na História com relação a outros eventos. Tell the story of the world from when God began to create, to this day. Even speak about what God promises to do in the future. There are 116 stories in this book. They are grouped into eight parts. A page at the beginning of each part, say in a few words what is in it. The stories are told in the order in which the events occurred. This will help you know when things happened in history in relation to other events.

This Atom theme is converted from SSKIN theme for user who using higher version than Android OS 4.0 ▶Atom Theme User Guide 1. Press and hold an empty space on the home screen to choose your theme, or press the menu for theme settings 2. Choose and apply the desired theme 3. Changing icons: able to change every icon (press and hold each icon to change individually). 4. Changing point color: able to change point colors on the top of home and app screens ▶Tips 1. Incorporating photos in the gallery with Atom icons (Menu – Wallpapers - Apply) 2. Changing colors and/or hiding home screen texts to match the theme (Launcher Settings – Home Screen – Icon Text Color) ▶Atom Store With weekly updated themes, icon packages, and widgets that range from sophisticated, simple themes to artists’ sensuous illustrations, you can decorate your phone’s home screen daily: search Atom Store on the search tab!! ▶Theme Maker A simple theme creating function that allows you to build your very own themes with the photos in your gallery 1. Press menu on your home screen, or enter through Theme Maker on the upper-right-hand corner of Theme Settings 2. Choose any wallpaper (multi-wallpaper, still photo, etc.) 3. Choose icons and point color and… 4. your very own personal theme! - You may not edit the theme once it is finished, but you can delete it in Theme Settings and simply create another! ▶Notes - Available in Android 4.0.2 or higher - You need at least 20MB in main storage to save theme related resources - The installed application’s icon will not be visible on the menu to improve usability - Soon to be available for tablet devices ex.) Galaxy Tab (X-large screen) - Badges for missed call and unread messages are only available in standard application: functionality may differ from one manufacturer to another - Optimus View series only supports a select few themes due to resolution (4:3) issues - Certain manufacturers’ default widgets may not show in Atom Launcher as they are made to use only from their default home screens ▶Customer Service Please leave reviews (5 stars are like Red Bull to exhausted developers) If you find any suggestions or inconveniences in using the application, please contact us through email addresses posted below: - Customer Service mail: cs@dlto.co.kr - Blog: http://blog.naver.com/atomlauncher - Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Atom.Home

description: Устал от городской жизни? Надоела рутина? Займись строительством собственной фермы! Тебя ждут девяносто увлекательных уровней, множество сюрпризов и шуток в игре «Веселая ферма 2». С нами не соскучишься! Быть фермером непросто. Сначала придется выращивать травку и кормить домашних животных, потом – заняться производством полезных продуктов и торговлей на рынке. Хочешь получить хорошую прибыль? Строй новые здания, обустраивай хозяйство, и не забывай про медведей: эти косолапые лакомки будут нападать на твою ферму. Покажи, кто тут хозяин! КЛЮЧЕВЫЕ ОСОБЕННОСТИ: ◇ Пять продуктов на городском рынке ◇ Четыре вида домашних животных ◇ Четыре породы медведей ◇ 12 хозяйственных построек с улучшениями ◇ 16 видов продуктов ◇ 19 типов наград ◇ Четыре дополнительных здания с тремя улучшениями ◇ Знаменитая Farm Frenzy теперь и на Android! --------- Другие игры из коллекции Alawar: ★МАГНАТ ОТЕЛЕЙ – Реализуй свои мечты! Организуй работу сети отелей по всему миру. ★СОЛНЕЧНАЯ ФЕРМА - Возделывай грядки, собирай урожай и сделай свою ферму лучшей на свете! --------- Наша страница на Facebook: AlawarEntertainment Присоединяйтесь к нам в Twitter: @AlawarMobile Получайте новости из первых рук! Знакомьтесь с играми и участвуйте в конкурсах! Tired of city life? I'm tired of the routine? Turn to the construction of our own farm! You'll find fascinating ninety levels, lots of surprises and jokes in the game "Farm Frenzy 2". With us, you never get bored! Farming is not easy. First need to grow weed and feed the animals, then - do the production of useful products and trade in the market. Do you want to make a good profit? Build new buildings, develop economy, and do not forget about bears: these pigeon-toed gourmet will attack your farm. Show me who's boss! Our new games and awesome contests!

건강노트 (Health note) app 은 개인의 건강관리를 위해 임상의사가 만든 노트형식의 어플리케이션입니다. 혈압관리, 혈당관리, 고지혈관리, 체중관리, 예약관리, 기타검사관리, 처방전저장, 숙녀노트, 동맥경화위험도, 비만도, 대사증후군 등 다양한 메뉴가 포함되어있습니다. 또한, 병원에서 수액치료를 받을 때 치료잔여 시간을 본인이 직접 계산 할 수 있는 수액치료시간예측의 기능도 있습니다. 다수의 사용자 등록이 가능하며 우측 상단 사용자 이름을 길게 눌러 사용자 전환을 할 수 있습니다. -혈압, 혈당, 체중의 입력 관리와 이전의 기록과 비교하여 알아보기 쉬운 그래프로 결과를 확인할 수 있습니다. -고지혈 관리 지침에 따라 실시간 입력한 혈압, 혈당, 혈액검사와 병력정보를 기반으로 동맥경화위험도계산 및 콜레스테롤치료 목표치, 비만도, 대사증후군의 정도를 제공합니다. -처방전을 사진 찍어 저장하고 예약 및 검사결과를 기록관리 할 수 있습니다. -숙녀노트는 여성의 생리주기에 따른 계획 및 기록을 관리할 수 있습니다. -환자의 수액치료(영양주사제) 시 수액 치료시간을 정확히 알려주는 기능이 있습니다. 1. 사용자 등록 - 사용자를 등록하고 병력입력 및 기타 특이사항을 입력합니다. 2. 혈압 - 혈압을 기록관리하고 누적된 혈압결과를 그래프로 보여주어 혈압변화를 평가하는 메뉴입니다. 3. 혈당 - 식전(공복시)혈당, 식후혈당, 취침전 혈당을 기록관리하고 누적된 혈당결과를 그래프로 보여주어 혈당변화를 평가하는 메뉴입니다. 4. 고지혈 - 혈액검사(콜레스테롤 등) 정보를 입력하는 메뉴입니다. 혈액검사입력란에 Total 콜레스테롤, HDL콜레스테롤, TG (중성지방)을 입력하면 LDL콜레스테롤이 자동 계산됩니다. 5. 비만도 - 키, 몸무게를 기록하여 비만도, 체질량지수(BMI)를 산출하고 체중변화를 그래프로 보는 메뉴입니다. 6. 기타검사 - 기타 검사결과를 입력 하는 메뉴입니다. 7. 예약기록 - 진료 및 검사예약 특이사항(약물 부작용)을 기록하고 관리하는 메뉴입니다. 8. 처방 기록 - 처방전을 관리하는 메뉴입니다. (처방전 사진 찍기, 처방전 직접 입력) 9. 예방접종 - 성인 및 소아의 예방접종 스케줄을 관리 10. 숙녀노트 - 생리일 및 배란예정일을 예측하고 기록 관리하는 메뉴입니다. 11. 종합결과. - 사용자가 입력한 정보 (성별, 나이, 혈압, 혈당, 체중, 키, 개인병력, 가족력, 혈액검사 – Total, HDL 콜레스테롤, 중성지방TG수치)를 update하여 동맥경화위험도, 비만도, 대사증후군의 결과를 보여주는 메뉴입니다. 12. 수액치료시간예측도우미(IVIC) - 수액량을 입력하고 점적통에 수액 방울이 떨어질 때를 맞추어 화면을 5회 이상 연속으로 터치하면 현재수액속도가 측정되어 치료잔여시간을 알려줍니다. - 본 애플리케이션의 종합 결과는 콜레스테롤 교육 프로그램과 치료지침에 근거하였으며 정확한 평가보다는 참고자료로 사용하십시오. -수액 치료시간 예측도우미 사용 시 1 mL의 방울 수를 나타내는 수액세트의 점적계수(drop factor)는 병원에서 주로 사용하는 1mL=20방울을 기본 값으로 설정하였습니다. 사용시 간호사에게 확인 바랍니다. www.hanvitmd.com ivic@hanvitmd.com ---- 개발자 연락처 : 대전광역시 서구 둔산동 1457 둔산현대아이텔 1026호 TEL. 042.488.2200 | FAX. 042.487.3321  Health Notes (Health note) app for the health care of the individual clinician notes created with the application form. description: PhotoFunia is the best way to add a spark to your photos, make them special and more original. In only a few seconds an amazing photo collage is ready, absolutely free. PhotoFunia is so straight forward to use, that anyone, at any age, can use it with ease. Would you like to see your picture on the cover of a magazine or on advertising billboards of Times Square? How amazing will it be to see your portrait on the walls of Louvre or Hermitage museums? Want to try out an astronaut or a Santa suit? Or you prefer something more exotic, just like a dancer at the Rio's carnival? Excited to find out how good you look with a witch's hat or a queen's crown on? Perhaps you're just looking for a nice frame for your photos on a special occasion? Make your own mark on the sand or write graffiti text on the wall, carve your name on the ground or create your very own road sign using our fantastic text effects. To add shadows, age your photo or render it black and white just visit Filters category. A myriad of hundreds of effects is waiting for you. Our effects library is always expanding and every week you can find something new. As previously mentioned, using PhotoFunia couldn't be simpler: pick you desired effect, upload your photo and viola! All in all in just two simple steps and you have your very own work of art ready to save, send via email or share with your friends on a social site. Take PhotoFunia with you wherever you go and create stunning images on your mobile or tablet with our great mobile app. Note: All image manipulation is performed in the cloud therefore WiFi or 3G connection is required for application to work.

Food Additives gives you all details about food's additives that are in your food. Search by name or by E and get details to know what you risk when you eat some food. Food Additives provides also a colorblind mode that is ideal for daltonians to distinguish additives colors. Don't hesitate to contact me for feedbacks or new ideas : sylvain.saurel@gmail.com

Looking for a simple and efficient timer app to help you during your workouts ? Well you just found it ;-) Already downloaded more than a million times, HIIT Interval Training Timer will help you focus on your workout and forget about the time, just follow the sounds. And when you’re done, you can share your results with your friends on Twitter ! First it was developed for HIIT (High Intensity Interval Training) workouts, a famous method to burn fat in a short & intense workout. But our users showed us you can use it every time you need a timer : crossfit, running, cycling, HIIT, Tabata, yoga, stretching, fitness, weightlifting ... and even cooking ! And if you love the app, you can purchase the AD FREE version, for only 1.99 $. More features will come soon with this version ;-) You can even use it with a HIIT card game called "HIIT the Game" ! http://bit.ly/HIITTHEGAME * A FEW FEEDBACKS FROM OUR USERS “ Just what I need for my HIIT sessions! audio is clear and works great :) no more looking at a timer! “ Bianca, April 1st 2015 “Accountable Interval timing. Best interval app. So easy to use, set, turn on, update. Just learned I can adjust the timer sound. Cool! “ Patricia, March 31st 2015 “ Great for those easily distracted folks!!! Ooh shiny, lol!!! So helpful, no more loosing track of what rep I'm on! “ Nancy, March 27th 2015 * WHAT’S HIIT ? * High-intensity interval training (HIIT) is an enhanced form of interval training, an exercise strategy alternating periods of short intense anaerobic exercise with less-intense recovery periods. HIIT is a form of cardiovascular exercise. Usual HIIT sessions may vary from 4–30 minutes. These short, intense workouts provide improved athletic capacity and condition, improved glucose metabolism, and improved fat burning. This definition comes from wikipedia ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/High-intensity_interval_training ) where you can find a lot more informations. It explains some very popular program, like the TABATA. HIIT is also a common practice in Crossfit trainings. * HOW TO USE THE APP ? * You can use it during all trainings with intervals or other timed repetition Basically, this is how it works : on the first screen you will set up your workout phases durations (preparation time, work, rest, rounds and cool down) and you will choose your sound. Then hit “Go !”, work and just follow the sound… or the voice ! You can listen to your own music, just make sure you can still hear the sound. At the end of the workout, a new feature allows you to share your workout with your friends on Twitter @hiit_android (and soon on Facebook !). Main features : ** 3 sounds choice and a voice ** Load preset : you can load one of our existing preset (Fat Loss, Tabata) or one you saved previously ** Save preset : you can save the workout you just set up ** Link to our Facebook page : you can like the app, share your experience with other users, share your workouts, make suggestions for new features, … ** Vibrate mode ** 3 seconds warning click ** Forward / Backward button during the workout to go to the next/previous interval ** Step Counter included in the training screen New features are added regularly, thanks for your feedbacks and your votes in our forum ( http://hiit.uservoice.com/forums/54804-general ) * PHONE PERMISSIONS * Now automatically pause and resume if a phone call arrives. This is why PHONE_STATE permissions are required. But the app never collects and stores phone numbers from users phones.
release_text: V6.6 We fixed 2 bugs reported by our users : some people reported they had to press the GO button twice to start; some people also reported they can't share their workout on Facebook. And now all the buttons highlight when pressed. We are sorry for this new update, shortly after the 6.5, but we decided we couldn't wait for weeks to fix these bugs. Looking forward to your feedbacks ! And don't hesitate to leave a message if you have a question Thanks for your support !

description: E-recipes is an application designed for everyone with a taste for food and cooking. It comes from simpliest to complex recipes. From classic traditional Slovak dishes to international specialties. You can choose from dozens of recipes. Each recipe is explained step by step with all necessary ingredients, details and procedures. Recipes are sorted by category and you can choose your favorites. Piece of courage, few cups of skill, spoon of creativity and e-recipes App, and than the culinary show in your kitchen can start! All recipes are available in Slovak language.
