Si sufres el trastorno Memetro esta es tu aplicación. Memetro App es una plataforma para detectar controles de revisores en las redes de transporte público de cualquier ciudad del planeta. A modo de red social las personas afectadas por este curioso trastorno pueden compartir alertas y visualizar todos los controles de su ciudad en tiempo real. FUNCIONES: Enviar alertas de controles. Visualizar alertas geolocalizadas en el mapa. Consultar el panel de alertas recientes. Leer las alertas en formato Twitter en 140 caracteres. Añadir nuevas ciudades a la red social. Configurar y recibir alertas push. Informarte de metodologías y nuevas herramientas para aprender a vivir con el trastorno. Su funcionamiento es muy sencillo. Cuando una persona utiliza el metro, tren, bus o cualquier otro medio de transporte colectivo y localiza un control de revisores, sólo tiene que hacer una alerta mediante el panel que facilita la aplicación. De esta manera si una persona sufre un episodio del Trastorno Memetro podrá mirar en su móvil y ver al momento si existen controles cercanos evitando al máximo el riesgo de sufrir posibles sanciones . ¿QUÉ ES EL TRASTORNO MEMETRO? Memetro es un tipo de trastorno sobre el funcionamiento de la memoria durante el cual, la persona afectada es incapaz de recordar que según la normativa vigente de los transportes metropolitanos tiene que validar el título de transporte. Este trastorno puede deberse por la activación de un mecanismo de defensa de la persona, el cuál, ocurre después de un evento traumático casi siempre relacionado con la noticia de la subida abusiva de las tarifas, el mal funcionamiento del servicio o bien, cualquier malestar relacionado con la dificultad de movilidad de las personas. SÍNTOMAS Aumento de la agudeza visual, Fijación en patrones e indicios de controles, Alteración del estado de alerta, Aumento de la potencia muscular, Aumento de la sensibilidad auditiva o Invisibilidad son algunos de los principales síntomas. Para más información visita http://www.memetro.net/ Crowdfunding para ayudar a desarrollar futuras funciones y mantenimiento de la red de alertas. http://goteo.org/project/memetro-app If you suffer the disorder Memetro this is your application. Memetro App is a platform for detecting reviewers controls on public transport networks of any city in the world. As a social network for people affected by this curious disorder can share alerts and view all the controls of your city in real time. FEATURES: Email alerts controls. Display geo alerts on the map. Check the panel of recent alerts. Read the alerts at Twitter format of 140 characters. Add new cities on the social network. Set up and receive push alerts. Notified of methodologies and new tools for learning to live with the disorder. Its operation is very simple. When a person uses the subway, train, bus or other means of public transport and localized control reviewers, just do an alert through the panel for easy application. Thus if a person suffers an episode of disorder Memetro can look at your phone and see if there are nearby when controls avoiding as much risk of possible sanctions. WHAT IS UPSET MEMETRO? Memetro is a type of disorder on memory performance during which the affected person is unable to remember that under current regulations of the metropolitan transport have to validate the ticket. This disorder can be caused by activation of a defense mechanism of the person, which, after a traumatic event occurs almost always related news gouging rates, malfunctions or service, any related discomfort the difficulty of the mobility of people. SYMPTOMS Increased visual acuity, fixation patterns and indications of controls, Impaired alertness, increase muscle strength, increase in hearing sensitivity or Invisibility are some of the main symptoms. For more information visit http://www.memetro.net/ Crowdfunding to help develop future roles and network maintenance alerts. http://goteo.org/project/memetro-app

Second part of the Monster Dubstep series. Function Loops & Audio Evolution strike back with this wall-breaking sample pack, taking the next step in quality to fulfill all your needs, while creating monstrous tracks. So fasten your seatbelts and enjoy the journey to the Dark Side! Warning: this app is 31MB in size, so it's best to download over a WiFi connection. Preferably use headphones to hear the full quality and low bass of the samples! These samples are royalty-free and can be used in commercial projects. Copyright remains at Function Loops. Installation: Please press the 'Install sample pack' button to unpack the samples to the Audio Evolution 'SamplePacks' directory. Usage: In Audio Evolution Mobile press the top-left folder icon and select 'Import sample from sample pack'. Choose the sample pack and then a sample you wish to import. In the 'Stretch and pitch' dialog you can change the tempo and pitch to your current project's values. After pressing 'Ok', the sample will be displayed and can be looped/repeated by long-tapping the sample and choosing 'Repeat' in the pop-up menu. Or watch the YouTube tutorial video from the free loop packs! This pack contains the following loops: DRUM_01_130bpm.wav DRUM_02_130bpm.wav DRUM_03_130bpm.wav DRUM_04_130bpm.wav DRUM_05_130bpm.wav DRUM_06_130bpm.wav DRUM_07_130bpm.wav DRUM_08_130bpm.wav DRUM_09_130bpm.wav DRUM_10_130bpm.wav DRUM_10b_130bpm.wav DRUM_11_130bpm.wav DRUM_11b_130bpm.wav SYNTH_01_E_130bpm.wav SYNTH_02_E_130bpm.wav SYNTH_03_E_130bpm.wav SYNTH_04_E_130bpm.wav SYNTH_05_E_130bpm.wav SYNTH_06_E_130bpm.wav SYNTH_07_E_130bpm.wav SYNTH_08_E_130bpm.wav SYNTH_09_E_130bpm.wav SYNTH_10_E_130bpm.wav SYNTH_11_E_130bpm.wav SYNTH_12_E_130bpm.wav Function Loops website: http://www.functionloops.com/ Audio Evolution Mobile: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.extreamsd.aemobile Look at 'More from developer' to download more sample packs!

Do you like retro arcade games? So do we! Star Fighter is a classic idea with several twists. Everything about this game says retro arcade! Once you have mastered the game in normal mode, try turning on the enemy spawning feature! The larger ships (re)spawn smaller ships which had been destroyed. The game will keep playing as long as you can take it, and the difficulty rises slightly with each new level. You may not need a pocket full of quarters, but your thumb won't know the difference. If you like classic arcade space shooting games, you'll love Star Fighter! • Stores up to five high scores. • Use default weapons, or 1 of 3 special weapons. • Shields absorb both energy and physical impacts. • Detailed Settings screen to customize game play. • Catch special energy bonuses to power up your shields and weapons. • Phone/Tablet compatible! Have a comment or suggestion? We would love to hear from you! Message us on our Facebook page, or at contact@osoftdev.com ! Also, check out Star Fighter 2! Michael Cooley Origin Software Development

My Android applications will now be supported by a "pay what you want" system. You can choose your price US$1 - US$50 in US$1 increments. The first app that will be migrated to this system will be Octave, followed by others. While this may be disappointing for some, I have realized that giving this work away free (as in $) doesn't serve your or my interests well. It is clear from users that they love what I have done, but want more features and better support. It bothers me significantly that I am not able to provide it because of time and money constraints. This will not be about making a lot of money, this will simply be about creating a better project by paying for developer time going forward. By the way, if you have paid previously via the Play Store for any of my apps, no additional charge is required. Also, paying one amount will cover your usage of all of my apps, which will all adopt the same payment system. How money is spent (after Google gets their cut): 10% (or more): Donated to Free or Open projects that my works is dependent on. 10% (or more): To the Lord's work (humanitarian work). Remaining: Developer time There is pretty much 0 overhead for the work I do.

description: Because there's no room for error, turn to McGraw-Hill's I.V. Drug Handbook. Featuring a strong focus on patient safety, administering and monitoring I.V. drugs, the Handbook delivers concise, practical guidance to help you carry out one of the most difficult tasks you face. Written by and for practicing nurses and pharmacists, the Handbook is reliable, comprehensive, and easy-to-use. *** Fully Functional 7-Day Trial **** Everything you need for safe, successful I.V. drug administration: * All-inclusive coverage of over 350 parenteral drugs with the latest warnings from the FDA * Includes antibiotics, insulin, pain medications, emergency drugs -- and more coverage of chemotherapeutic agents with more supportive therapies than you'll find in any other text * Provides the most comprehensive, specific, evidence-based guidelines on administering high-alert and hazardous drugs available anywhere * Each drug monograph includes administration guidelines, covering preparation, dilution & compatibility, infusion rates, admixtures, supportive therapies and monitoring. * Features a 32 page full-color patient safety insert describing measures for ensuring safe drug administration, including 6 pages on inserting an I.V. catheter * Uses distinctive icons to call your attention to "clinical alerts," "life-threatening reactions," "high-alert", "hazardous" drugs, and more Biographical note: Patricia Dwyer Schull, MSN, RN, has been in medical publishing for more than twenty years. Prior to establishing MedVantage Publishing, Patricia held executive management positions with the top medical publishers in the world. She has edited and authored many popular nursing publications including several drug titles. Before entering the publishing business, Patricia spent 16 years in various aspects of nursing management, direct patient care and staff education as a professional registered nurse. A search tool Featuring various search options to help you find the words you need more easily, including: * A quick search of words while you type * A 'fuzzy filter' for when you are not sure of the correct spelling of a word * A 'keyword' search for finding key words within phrasal verbs * A wild card search facility which can replace a letter or a group of letters A learning tool The dictionary app includes a number of features which help you to expand your vocabulary further: * A 'Favourites' feature allows you to create your own categories and lists of words * Your last visited words are all saved in your 'History', so that you can quickly look back at recently checked words * Discover a new word every day with the 'Daily' feature * Ability to have dictionary Word of the Day as a widget on the device home screen * See words in context with example sentences * Online and offline modes supported, the offline mode allows you to download the whole dictionary and work independently from data connections

How to launch an app on wearable: You can adopt any of these two methods given below to launch this game. . Method 1 : via Voice Command You can give a voice command by using ‘OK Google’ or whatever the phrase you have set for ‘voice search’ and name the app. It will directly lead you to the app. . Method 2: via Start Menu If you are unable to launch any app via ‘Voice Command’, You can follow the steps given below to launch the app. - Tap on the screen of your wearable watch - Go down the menu that appears and you will find ‘Start’ at the end of the menu. - Tap on ‘Start’ - You will find the list of wearable apps that are installed on your watch. - Launch the app from the list. . How to link your Android wearable with Phone: . If you have not link your smartphone with your wearable watch, then please follow the steps to link it. After integration, will be able to launch the installed apps. - Turn on the bluetooth on smartphone. - Install ‘Android Wear’ app on your smartphone. - After installation, go to ‘pair a new wearable’ in ‘Android Wear’ app. - Select the wearable device from the list. - Your wearable watch is connected to your smartphone. . description: Find Me -- Tornado Safety App is a first of its kind, family of disaster safety applications for Android devices. This application is an ALERT Notification system for individuals to send to their family, friends and emergency professionals to be able to locate you FOLLOWING an incident. Following the Moore Oklahoma tornadoes, it was reported by the American Red Cross that many individuals said they did not take shelter because they were afraid that nobody would find them. Also people didn’t know exactly where their children at school or other family members actually went to take cover. The FIND ME – Tornado Safety App , once activated by the individual, will alert (via text, email and phone message) a pre-determined list of contacts that shelter has been taken. The application will in a future update also be synced to Facebook and Twitter to make posts to general audiences. With the push of one icon on the mobile device, FIND ME will register the last known GPS Location of the individual, as well as a custom input of a specific location within the structure where shelter has been taken. While this Application is primarily a notification tool for the Individual and family and friends during a tornado, there is a larger scale function of this application if overlaid with a product such as ESRI’s Community Software. If community first responders, State Emergency Management or FEMA utilizes the ESRI Community software during an active tornado, the FIND ME –Tornado Safety App is overlaid on this software , officials could see immediately where people have taken shelter and could be trapped and need rescuing. No subscription charges! Only one one-time cost of $2.99 for peace of mind.

description: Find out what's really happening in that missing third of your life... We’ve spent months developing a beautiful, intuitive sleep cycle tracker and dependable optimal alarm that lets you customize your sleep tracking. Record your movements and sounds during the night and wake up better each morning during light sleep. - Set and customize multiple alarms for your partner, as alerts - Easily customize smart alarm, motion tracking, sound recording options - Simple punch-in using widget, options for auto-silence and airplane mode - Includes quick solutions to fall asleep and stay awake - Set a automatic alarm to wake up. - Set a reminder for you to go to sleep. Sleepbot now contains the most comprehensive sleep analysis on the market— - Tap detailed motion/sound graphs to play back sleep talk, snores, etc. - Direct comparison between movement and sound correlations - Trend graphs (length, sleep/wake times, pattern) to see your sleep quality over time - Review your sleep statistics, debt log, and averages - Never lose your sleep data – automatic backup to view and share at mysleepbot.com Sleepbot is the only sleep application that includes: motion and sound graphs, sleep debt log, statistics, trend graphs (averages, sleep/wake times, patterns), multiple custom alarms, resources to help you fall asleep and stay awake and is completely free! *** Supported by: ~ Gentle Alarm ~ Relax & Sleep ~ Tasker SleepBot is recognized by the United States National Institute of Health and the National Academy of Engineering as the First Place Winner of "Go Viral To Improve Health" competition. **Note: New permissions. Google Account permission allows us to let you sign up and login using your Google Account. Read Phone state allow users to punch in online and deliver the message to the right phone with the right account. Explanation of all permissions: http://developer.mysleepbot.com/why-permissions Thanks for your patience-- we made it and couldn't have done it without you!! This is our first version with smart alarm and tracking options, so please let us know if there are any problems and how we can improve. Again, thanks to our users and more updates soon! :) - SleepBot Team http://www.mysleepbot.com http://twitter.com/sleepbot http://facebook.com/sleepbot

A "scrolling shooter" or "shoot em up" game inspired by the arcade classic Defender.. Zap the aliens with your laser gun whist avoiding their bullets. If things get really tight you can employ your smart-bombs and kill everything in sight. The aliens come in four different varieties: 1. Infantry... the troops, they shoot at you. 2. Mine-layers... they deposit a trail of deadly mines. 3. Emergers.... these come out of nowhere and start rapid fire shooting. 4. Exploders!... if you shoot one of these they die with a last-gasp spray of bullets! Defender Force employs a unique move-and-shoot mechanism that allows the user to play the game with just one finger. This may take a minute or two to get used to, but once mastered, you'll wonder why all shooters don't work this way. Much more exciting than space invaders. Warning: This retro shooter/space war is addictive!.

Also included in this theme are 5 different wall pictures including one that is transparent which you can place a gallery widget behind set to change in intervals. Pretty awesome! Not personalized enough? Through the UCCW editor you can change the font and background colors to your liking as well as your hotspots to your shortcuts. Tutorials: Note.. This may look difficult, but it really isn't. I wrote this for anyone who has never touched UCCW or a custom launcher. Every step is here. Nova Launcher Prime setup: Press menu on your phone Press Nova settings >desktop>desktop grid. Set rows to 11 and columns to 6. back out.. >Width margin. Set to none. back out.. >Height margin. Set to none. back out.. Make sure "show shadows" is unchecked > "home screens" and remove all but one screen. back out.. >"scroll effect" set to none. back out.. >Wallpaper scrolling. Set to off. back out.. Uncheck "infinate scroll". Scrool to the bottom and open the "advanced" tab and check "resize all widgets". Back out to main menu >Dock. Uncheck "enable dock". back out.. >Look and feel. Uncheck "show notification bar". back out.. >Gestures and buttons. >Swipe up. Click "app drawer". >Gestures and buttons. >Swipe down. Click "expand notifications". Done. UCCW setup: After you download the theme... Clear your homescreen of any icons or widgets Long press your homescreen Select "widgets" Click on UCCW Click the 4x1 widget Find and click "simplywhitestatusbar" Touch the white hand After the widget appears, long press it Click "resize" and resize it so it spans the width of your screen. Repeat this process for the rest of the Softly widgets. Once all 5 widgets are placed on the screen, rearrange them like the pictures. Done. Changing colors and hotspots: Open your app drawer Find and click UCCW Press your phone menu key Click "Lock widgets (Hotspot mode)". Click "off". Go to your home page Click one of the widgets Here you can change any color you want If you mess anything up beyond simple repair just delete the widget and add it again. *Don't add the new widget through the UCCW editor as the softly widgets will not show up in the list. You must make a whole new widget by long pressing your home screen.* To change the hotspots... scroll to the bottom of the UCCW editor Click a hotspot and choose what you'd like to change it to. Once you're done editing... go back into your app drawer >UCCW >phone menu >Lock widgets (hotspot folders) >press "on". Enjoy your awesome screen! FAQ: How to change temperature units? Open the UCCW app in your app drawer >menu> check Celsius. Why does the skin not show up in the list? This is a Google related issue with some Jellybean devices. If you have this issue, email me. Ill send you a fix.
Recompiled Original Gallery3D included in Android Open Source Project.

Taiwan Radio Online gives you smooth and uninterrupted experience in listening streaming radio channels of Taiwan There are over 100 channels supported in the app. If you know the URL of new streaming radio stations, you can add your own favourite stations. Current, support http, rtmp, mms with mp3, asx, pls, m3u8, m3u, flv format. Mark your favourite channels to put them on top of the list for quick access. Radio will be playing in background so that you can perform other activities. Shutdown timer allows you to turn off the radio automatically.

description: Gewinner des MOMMY AWARD in der Kategorie Apps für Kinder (www.netmoms.de) Nominiert für den AKEP (Best Performance in Electronic Publishing) AWARD Über 12 Mio Pixi jedes Jahr! Diese ist eines der Top10 Pixi als App! - großartiger Vorlese- und Zuhörspaß - viele lustige Animationen - illustrative Sounds - Vorlesetext zum Ein- und Ausblenden - Bilderpuzzle - Pixi-Basteltipp! - Pixi-App-Extra: eigene Tonspur, auf der Kinder und Erwachsene eine eigene Geschichte aufnehmen können! Ritter Bodobert sitzt gemütlich zuhause in seinem Sessel vor dem Kamin, als ihn das Abenteuer ruft: „Ritter Bodobert!“ Sofort machte sich Bodobert auf den Weg hinaus in die Schneeberge. Und dort findet Bodobert ... den Yeti! Den echten Yeti, nach dem alle schon so lange suchen. Aber, welch Überraschung! Der Yeti sieht ganz anders aus als gedacht ... Wir sind daran interessiert, unsere Apps kontinuierlich zu verbessern. Daher Anmerkungen, Verbesserungsvorschläge und Fehlermeldungen per E-Mail an support@carlsen.de , damit wir schnell antworten können. Allgemeine Bewertungen gerne direkt unter „Rezensionen“ posten. Vielen Dank! Winners of the MOMMY AWARD in the category Apps for Kids (www.netmoms.de) Nominated for the AKEP (Best Performance in Electronic Publishing) AWARD Over 12 million Pixi every year! This is one of the top 10 Pixi as an app! - Great reading and listening - Lots of funny animations - Illustrative sounds - Captions can show and hide - Picture Puzzle - Pixi Hobby Tip! - Pixi App Bonus: an extra audio track, can record a story on the kids and adults! Knight Bodobert sitting comfortably at home in his chair before the fire, as it calls the adventure: "Knight Bodobert!" Immediately Bodobert made his way out into the snowy mountains. And there is Bodobert ... the yeti! The real Yeti, looking after all so long. But what a surprise! The Yeti is very different than I thought ... We are keen to continuously improve our apps. Therefore, comments, suggestions and bug reports by e-mail to support@carlsen.de so that we can respond quickly. General Reviews welcome to post directly under "Reviews". Thank you!

description: This is the newest game in the "Kuma the Bear" series! A fun and easy-to-play game for everyone! With just one finger you can enjoy our new action game "Monkey Catapult"! Pulling the monkey and making him fly is so much fun! Where have the bananas from Monkey Village gone?! It looks like the jungle gorilla has taken them... Time to get back the stolen bananas! It's super easy to play! Just pull, stretch, and release the monkey! Hop from tree branch to tree branch, and collect all the bananas scattered in the jungle! As you climb higher and higher collecting bananas, what awaits you at the end of each stage?? You can also compete with your friends to see who's collected the most bananas! Let's see how many bananas you can get! ((Reasons why we recommend Flying Monkey~!)) ◆It's super easy to play with just one finger! ◆You will feel amazing when you make a good jump! ◆The more you play the better you will become! description: Map Distance Calculator application allows you to measure distances on a map by two ways. Firstly user can place pins on map and measure distance between consecutive pins. Secondly user can measure continuous path among points by pen tool. To do this user must click on map to place the pen first then long pressing on pen will activate the continuous drawing. Features: - Rich user experience - 3D maps - Measure discrete paths by pinpointing on map - Measure continuous paths with pen tool - Lets measure perimeter - Lets measure circumference - Lets user adjust map view angle - Shows distances to specific locations - Lets user choose meters, kilometers, miles or feets - Normal, satellite, terrain, hybrid map modes - Stores notes Twitter : https://twitter.com/LKETECH Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/lketech

description: Practice your Craps skills with this interactive application. Informative interface facilitates learning how to play Craps. - Learn how to play craps with informative windows that explain each type of bet. - Realistic Stickman Calls - Betting Advice for placing optimal amounts. - Winnings window shows origin bet, the odds, and total winnings in an easily readable table. - Menu Options : Add money, Mute sound, Roll dice in place, Disable notifications, Region info, Panning + Zoom. - Mark can be clicked to turn on and off odds on Come out roll. - Keeps track of your winnings and losses, with option to reset. - Status bar shows game state. Too many 7s? We have been looking into the dice probability with Google Analytics reports. With 1,707k+ rolls reported so far the statistics show sevens being rolled 198,119(Seven out) and 85,170(Come out wins) = 283289 Then divide by total to get = 16.5657% or about 1/6th of the time. Want to direct the next version? Please take a moment to answer some basic poll questions here: http://crapstrainerpro.com/your-input/ Or leave a some feedback on our NEW forums http://crapstrainerpro.com/forums/forum/dice-talk/ Ideas, bugs, questions? Email the developer directly: appmaster@e7systems.com If you want to become a tester for new releases email us with "Craps Trainer Tester" as the subject line. ********************************************* Updates are inspired from user reviews. Write a review and let us know what should be next. ********************************************* Update 1.4 thanks to: Niko J, Seth H, Linda W, Mik K Update 1.5 thanks to: Ryan M. and Bob C. Update 1.6 thanks to: Sharo M, Joseph G, David G and John S Keep the reviews coming! Update 1.7 thanks Clint W, J P, and our small group of testers. Update 1.9.2 thanks to many emails. (you know who you are:) Update 1.9.3 thanks to Tony M. and DJ Urban.
release_text: Come odds that are off are no longer lost when a seven is rolled during Come out. Horn bets fixed so that they don't remove chips from game.

description: Hunting Dinosaurs on rampage in a rainy Desert to survive. Hunt the Dinosaur in Desert a unique and different game with real 3D graphics on Google play store. The dinosaurs have attacked a small population in desert. As being a hunter you are in the town and, you have to play a role of a savior of the desert. you have got different weapons to challenge the dinosaur rampage in desert. You have to prove your skills of aiming, firing, shooting and hunting to destroy your target. There is tactic, strategy, fear, danger, attack and bloodshed in the game play, so, you have to be attentive, conscious, epic and ultimate in whole game play to catch your prey. There are two kinds of Dinosaurs to attack on you, Bigger and smaller. The bigger Dinosaurs will be shot dead with three bullets to fire on them, and, the smaller one with two bullets will be down to earth. You have to keep an eye on the dinosaurs coming from the different sides and aim to shoot them earlier than they approach you. If they approach and attack on you, you will lose the game. As more you hunt, as more score you get, the game is score based, and, you have to shoot more and get high score. How to play: You have to use navigation button on the left side to move your gun. The fire button on the right side of the bottom to fire on dinosaur. The aiming button to use for zoom in and zoom out. FEATURES: - Real 3D graphics environment. - First ever game in a rainy desert environment. - The natural sounds of rampage Dinosaurs and raining. - Best rifle and sniper gun for accurate shooting. - No Internet connectivity required while playing. - Addictive, loving & Full of fun. - Sounds On / Off button on display. - Multi-touch enabled. Note: Hunting and shooting dinosaurs in the game doesn't mean we love shooting or killing animals. It's for fun and adventure for the gamer to use animal characters. Your suggestion would be our great pleasure for the improvement of the games features : Follow us at ; https://www.facebook.com/zekabintl https://twitter.com/ZekabInt

Pirates and Treasures - For Adventurer Kids! The Adventure Word Puzzle is a powerful educational tool for kids. They will enjoy solving the puzzles and all adventure themes (pirates, vacation, sports) to learn the words! Word puzzles can be solved by moving the cards to the right place - this will improve the fine motor skills of your kid (simple drag & drop mechanism). Different options allow you to customize the difficulty level to match the abilities of your kids. You can either decide to see a preview of the letters or adjust the number of letters shown in the game. If your kid loves puzzles, this is just the perfect educational app! Adventure Word Puzzle for Kids Features: * The app teaches words * In total 20 scenes with more than 90 words! * Different options to match the abilities of your kids. * Improvement of the fine motor skills of your kid * Kid-friendly sounds and graphics Four scenes (including 20 words) of this educational Adventure Word Puzzle for Kids are free, more can be purchased in-game. Free scenes: Kids on the beach, camp adventure, pirates and monkeys, kids on vacation. Have fun playing, learning and discovering! Keywords: abc, alphabet, animal, baby, carribean, child, drag, drop, dyslexia, education, games, hawaii, kindergarten, learning, letters, match, monkey, move, pirate, play, preschool, puzzles, read, sailor, school, shape, toddler, treasures, words, write

Remember “back in the day” when you and your buddy would sit around and play hand-held electronic football? Well those great memories have been brought back with Creativity Driven's Retro Football for the Android powered phones and tablets. All of that same great football action and game play with updated graphics and sounds! Hear the crowd roar by marching your team down the field maneuvering through the opposition's defense to score a touchdown. This gridiron classic provides hours of fun for a single player, or go head-to-head with a friend in a turn-based style of game play! Retro Football is completely customizable allowing you to change Quarter Length, Difficulty and Sound. And for you Lefties out there, you can change the button layout giving you total control over your Retro Football experience. Best of all, Retro Football let's you check your stats giving you bragging rights with the results right there in black and white. And for those of you who are not sure how to play or even remember the electronic football games from the 70's and 80's, we've even built in a tutorial to help get you going. Look for other great games coming soon from Creativity Driven. Game Features: * Retro style game play reminiscent of the 70's and 80's hand-held electronic football games. * Customizable game options and button layout. * Three game difficulties: Rookie, Pro and All Star * Built in tutorial

description: Shopping List, Pantry List & To-Do List in a small, intuitive and easy-to-use app. With Out of Milk, your Shopping List stays with you everywhere you go and you'll have it on-hand once you're ready to go grocery shopping. The Pantry List allows you keep track of your pantry items (spices, essentials, etc...) so that you always know what you have at home. The To-Do list helps you keep track of any other items on your daily list. ★ Creating an Out of Milk account, syncing and list sharing is completely FREE ★ Positively reviewed by the WSJ: 'The Out of Milk app is straightforward and offers three main list functions: shopping, pantry and to do.' Babble '#1 of Top 25 Apps For Moms', Nielsen 'Top 10 Most-Used Shopping Apps', CNET How To 'Simplify your grocery shopping on Android', Mashable 'Grocery List Apps That Make Shopping, Syncing Lists Simple' ### Out of Milk Features ### -- Standard Features -- ★ Multiple shopping & to-do lists ★ Sync and share your shopping lists with others in real-time ★ Get notified of grocery deals while in a store (US only) ★ Access your lists online from anywhere on http://www.outofmilk.com/ ★ Save time by grouping items into categories ★ Scan or manually enter items in your shopping lists ★ Plan grocery list ★ Shopping list history remembers items ★ Pantry lists let you inventory anything so you always know what's in your pantry ★ Share lists by text or email ★ Move or copy items between shopping list and pantry lists ★ Displays grand total and running total on your shopping list ★ View price history while editing a shopping list item ★ Mark items in your shopping list as tax-free. Out of Milk will also remember your choice for future reference ★ Browse and search local grocery deals, sales and promotions On top of all of our standard/free features (that stay free forever), we are also offering a Pro version for only $1.99! Just search for "out of milk unlocker" to purchase/install the key that will enable all Pro features. You need both this app and the "Out of Milk Pro Unlocker" installed for it to work. -- Pro Features -- ★ Pick from different themes ★ Pick from different fonts ★ Customize tap and long-press actions ★ Widgets - Add list widgets to your homescreens ★ Coupons - Keep track of coupons in your shopping lists As an Out Of Milk user, you will also get incredible support from our team which you won't get from other apps. So if you have a problem, just email us at support@capigami.com ### Permission Information ### For detailed information regarding the permissions used by Out of Milk, visit http://support.outofmilk.com/entries/37000206
release_text: If you are experiencing issues, email us at support@capigami.com v4.3.2: * No more ads! * Import recipes from popular recipe websites and add the ingredients to your shopping list! See the list of supported sites: http://goo.gl/8J4iiT * Out of Milk can now categorize items for you automatically (can be turned on/off in Settings) * Editing items is much faster (one tap on the item) * More products are recognized by the barcode scanner * Tons of other small improvements

description: Feel the arrival of spring and the fragrance of Sakura flowers with our brand new app ''Cherry Blossom Live Wallpaper''! Bath the screen of your Android ™ phone with delicate white and pink petals of a ''cherry blossom'' flower! Immerse yourself in a magical floral world and unwind while spring flowers caress your skin leaving it smooth and soft! Relax in a beautiful floral garden and perceive the sweet scent from a cherry blossom tree! Get the free download right now and reveal the secrets of natural landscapes in Japan! ♥ The mesmerizing ''Sakura live wallpaper'' will be perfect for your new smartphone! ♥ Cool 3D parallax effect! ♥ Decorate your screen with one of many cheerful spring desktop backgrounds! ♥ These high definition flower pictures will leave you breathless! ♥ Both landscape mode and home-screen switching are fully supported! ♥ Our free and cute images await you! Follow the installation instructions: Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpapers ♥ You can choose from lots of different background wallpapers. ♥ HD graphics and open GL. ♥ The full control over the speed and density of glittering particles. ♥ Suitable for 99% mobile phone devices. ♥ When you do not use your phone, this live wallpaper will sleep and it will not wear your battery out. ♥ ''Cherry blossom background'' fully supports horizontal orientation and looks fantastic on both mobile phones and tablet devices. The best ''nature wallpaper'' has arrived on the market! Our cherry blossom HD images are a perfect choice for you! Take a deep breath and dive into a miraculous Japanese garden of cherry blossom flowers! Let the pink and white Sakura petals on a pathway lead you to a peaceful place where yoga and meditation are practiced! Discover the mystery of a marvelous Zen garden! Reveal why they are considered the Buddhism temple! Set the Zen garden background images on your Samsung Galaxy S4 and give your phone a totally new look! Admire the soft green grass and blossoming trees against the clear blue sky! Watch the amazing waterfall illuminated by the Sun rays! Enter the serene world of Japan and China! Sit under a cherry blossom tree with your loved one! This ''flower live wallpaper'' can be your romantic getaway! Spend your springtime and summertime enjoying cherry blossom landscape with your soul mate! This summer could be your summer of love! Our ''cherry mobile themes'' are ideal for all girls! Color your galaxy phone white, pink and purple! Download this cherry blossom girls wallpaper right now and you won't regret it! The fragrance of a rose, daisy and lavender cannot be compared to the sweet floral aroma of Sakura flower! You don't need heart flowers or heart trees to make your Samsung Galaxy Nexus look romantic! If you want a perfect love wallpaper, get our pink and white HD images immediately! Be enchanted by the beautiful pictures of falling cherry blossoms and sparkles that appear all over your screen! This is so far the prettiest girly app on the store! Let your day start fresh with our cherry blossom wallpaper! Now you have a chance to admire the Japanese symbol of peace and good fortune every day! Don't waste more time! As soon as you set Cherry Blossom Live Wallpaper on your screen, it will become your favorite mobile application! Share it with your friends, family, girlfriends and boyfriends - it is perfect for everybody! Get the free download right now and enjoy the most beautiful spring flowers ever! * Android is a trademark of Google Inc. * This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by Samsung. * This app is ad-supported. Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Top-Live-Wallpapers/191929750972297

YOUR FAVOURITE PLAYERS, CLUBS, AND LEAGUES Topps is back with the all-new KICK 15, the only real-world, real-time football trading card app. Only in KICK 15 can you play cards and earn points in real-time based on how actual players perform on the pitch. Follow the excitement as the live action unfolds in every Barclays Premier League, Bundesliga, and Major League Soccer match with KICK 15. MULTIPLE LEAGUES AND LANGUAGES Featuring 57 licensed clubs and over 1,000 players, KICK 15 expands into the German Bundesliga and the United States Major League Soccer. And for the first time, KICK 15 is available in English, German and Spanish. The global game is now on a global stage in KICK 15. Get ready to take on supporters from Manchester United, Bayern Munich, Chelsea, Arsenal, Liverpool, Borussia Dortmund, Schalke, Tottenham Hotspur, Bayer Leverkusen, Hamburg, LA Galaxy, Portland Timbers, Seattle Sounders, DC United, and more. FLOW OF THE GAME SCORING Watch live matches and score points with your best KICK 15 player cards. Our improved “flow of the game” scoring system allows users to predict momentum changes, swap cards in their starting XI, and feel the excitement of every touch, pass, tackle, shot, and goal. With KICK 15, more events turn into more points ensuring that only the smartest users will win. Win the week, earn your cap! MATCH CENTER Never miss setting your starting XI with the all-new MATCH CENTER. Keep track of each match across multiple leagues around the globe, as it’s all happening. Plus our enhanced user interface mixes a sleek, modern design with more user-friendly card-playing features to maximize the fun. AMAZING NEW CARD SETS Tired of only one base card per player? How about five! KICK 2015 launches with five base cards per player, each one scoring differently based on rarity. Plus, new limited-print cards indicate card circulation as they are being sold so you can best time your packet openings. But hurry, once a certain number is sold, they are automatically sold out! And with stunning new insert card sets released daily, you’ll be able to chase all your favourite football stars. TRADE LIKE A PROFESSIONAL KICK 15 has the best football card collecting community in the world. All-new expanded trading allows for up to 18 cards to be swapped in a single deal. And with multiple leagues, you can execute mega-deals, like Wayne Rooney, Daniel Sturridge, Thomas Muller, Jack Wilshere for Steven Gerrard, Diego Costa, Eden Hazard and Emre Can. A new Trader Score allows you to rate your fellow traders on their trustworthiness and deal-making ability. And with the new Locked Card feature, you can prevent annoying offers for your favourite cards as well as show them off. Get ready for match day madness with KICK 15. MORE INFO --Follow @toppsKICK on twitter. --Check out our fan page on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ToppsKICK

Can you identify the State flags? Test your knowledge of the State flags in this State Flag Quiz. A great quiz game for all ages. Learn the State flags as you play. The score is based on the number of questions, the percent answered correct, and the time it takes to complete the quiz.

description: Remote control for iTunes and Windows Media Player over Wifi. This app allows you to sit on the couch and use your phone or tablet to remotely control the media being played on your Windows PC. - Remote control of Music and Videos. - Select playlists, albums, artists, tracks etc. - Play,Pause,Next,Previous,Shuffle,Repeat,Seek. - Remote start up of iTunes/WMP. - Download music tracks from PC to phone. - Control player volume and PC's main volume. - Keyword search through all media. - View Album art. - Swipe finger or shake phone to change tracks. - Change skins. - Remotely send PC to sleep. NOTE: You must install the free PC software found at www.smartphoneremote.com to use this app. Supports: WinXP, Vista, Win7, iTunes10, iTunes11, WMP11, WMP12 Please rate this app if you like it! *** 48 hour 'peace of mind' refund available. Just email us within 48 hours of purchase for a full refund *** Please send any suggestions/problems/comments to us at the email address below. Thanks.
release_text: - Support of iTunes. - Full media search facility. - Tablet and Phone support combined. - Control PC's main volume. - Remotely Sleep/Hibernate PC. - Auto-connects to previous player. - Track list displayed in browse window. - Various bug fixes. PLEASE CLOSE WINDOWS MEDIA PLAYER BEFORE INSTALLING

description: Little baby started nursery a few weeks ago and already got sick so we have to take him to the doctor Tornie wich is very nice. At the clinic we meet with the doctor who will see the baby. In the consulting room the baby is restless, agitated, crying. Tornie doctor is preparing to consult the baby. The doctor listens him with a stethoscope, puts the thermometer, makes a soothing intramuscular injection. Baby is ready to take blood for testing to determine whether is an infection in the body and the results will in form us. Once the blood was collected, Tornie doctor applies a patch on the arm. After all medical investigations, we`will take the little baby to x -rays to identify what problems may have. After finishing to do x-rays , we will examine the stomach by bacteria, viruses and other germs and try to expunge it. During this time, the laboratory tests arrived and we can realize better what kind of problems has the baby. We will administer an oxygen mask to breathe better, and this time the baby will enjoy. We shall administer an infusion hydrating salts, we'll feed him with milk, we will administer medication by mouth, we'll give him a lollipop that will enjoy, we will administer a tonic syrup, and to be as good and happy, we will play with the baby and the toys that baby's mother brought in the hospital where he was investigated . Finally we will give baby the sailor clothes and the boy will be happy and healty. Control: Use your finger to play the baby doctor game This application is FREE and SAFE for install. If you like our game, please share it with your friends, and RATE US!

description: MobiePlus dialer is a mobile app for Android. The MobiePlus dialer helps users make international calls easier from an Android phone. The application is free to download. After downloading and installing the MobiePlus dialer, open the application and follow the simple wizard to set-up the MobiePlus dialer: VoIP Calls via Wifi, 3G / 4G, edge or UMTS. You will just need to select the Contact you want to call or enter the number manually in the DialPad. The MobiePlus dialer will take it from here. The same MobiePlus dialer low rates for international calling apply if you use the MobiePlus dialer. Application features: •Call from Android phone native Contacts •Call History •Invite •Rates

필사모 화실은 서울시 마포구 합정동에 위치하고 있으며, 연필 정밀묘사와 우드 버닝 (인두기로 나무를 태워서 그리는 그림)을 전문으로 하는 개인 화실입니다. 2004년부터 시작하여 현재까지 운영되고 있으며, 미술학원에서 배우는 입시미술이 아닌 저 개인이 독학으로 익힌 그림 기법을 전수하고 있습니다. * 연필 정밀 묘사는 사진으로 보고 그대로 그려내는 것으로 일단 배워두면 실력이 좋아짐에 따라 지인이나 연인 또는 가족들에게 세상 하나뿐인 감동적인 선물을 줄 수도 있고, 더 나아가서 꾸준한 노력으로 실력을 키운다면 작품활동이나 개인 전시회까지도 가능하답니다. * 우드 버닝(wood burning)은 온도 조절이 가능한 전문가용 인두기로 원목 나무를 태워서 그리는 기법으로 종이에 그리는 연필화와는 또다른 느낌의 감성을 표현할 수 있고, 인테리어 소품부터 엄청난 디테일의 작품까지 다양하게 표현할 수 있답니다. 우선 인두기에 대한 접근성이 좋고, 나무를 태워서 그린다는 신선함으로 최근 국내에서 유행하고 있는 분야이며 많은 분들이 취미로 배우고 즐기고 있습니다. 필사모 화실에서는 취미미술로써 일반 성인들을 대상으로 하고 있으며, 1:1 개인 교습 방식으로 완전 초보인 분들도 한걸음 한걸음 그림에 다가설 수 있도록 꼼꼼하고 알기 쉽게 눈높이 지도를 하고 있습니다. 그동안 그림을 배워보고 싶었으나 이런저런 이유로 주저하셨던 분들은 한번쯤 용기내서 도전해 보세요. 잘 이끌어 드리겠습니다. 그림을 배우고 졸업을 하고 난 이후에도 조건에 따라 화실을 꾸준히 이용하실 수도 있고, 그림도 무한 A/S 받으실 수 있습니다. 어플을 설치하셔서 제 작품과 졸업생들의 작품들도 감상해 보시고 그러다 한번쯤 배워보고픈 맘이 생기시면 언제든 연락주시고 찾아오세요. 합정동화실,취미미술,연필화,초상화,인물화,그림기법,우드버닝,연필그림 Phil Hapjeong private firebox is located in Mapo, Wood Burning precise description pencil Match Mania is simple yet addicting pair solving puzzle game or connect game with a fresh gameplay. The main objective of this game is to remove all tiles by connect two identical cards that connected with up to 3 straight lines before time runs out. Feature: ✔ 3 Game mode: Classic, Survival, Puzzle ✔ More challenging level of Classic Mode ✔ More brain teasing level of Puzzle Mode ✔ Test your endurance in Survival Mode (Unlimited Level) ✔ Save and Resume Game ✔ Online Scoreboard HOW TO PLAY: To play match mania you must connect / link the same tiles into pair, but only the same tiles that is connect / link through up to 3 lines and the link is not blocked by other tiles can be removed. Taqs: Onet , Connect Game , kawaii, kyodai, animal match, pair, pikachu pair, fruit link, animal link, monster link, connect game, matching game.
release_text: ✔ Fresh new UI ✔ Add new gameplay with more level.

description: Check out why “Aquarium Live Wallpaper Free” app for Android ™ is one of the most popular apps ever! Nothing can beautify your phone more than tropical fish images with bright colors and amazing patterns. This is a wonderful opportunity to be the part of the magnificent water world among the exotic sea creatures. Enjoy the beautiful scenery on your home screen that can make your day beautiful and calm you down if you feel tensed. These beautiful background pictures with aquarium theme are something you have to have on your phone. There are ten breathtaking ocean fish wallpapers on your disposal so you can change them whenever you want. Choose the exotic fish wallpaper HD you like the most and watch how the bubbles of different size start to float on your screen turning it into a real aquarium live wallpaper. How to install: Home → Menu → Wallpapers → Live Wallpapers → Aquarium Live Wallpaper Free ★★★ Cool wallpaper app Features ★★★ ★ 10 aquarium wallpapers HD to choose ★ Bubbles live wallpaper animation: slow, normal, fast! ★ Fabulous animation makes the aquarium background images look like the best animated wallpaper 3D in the whole universe ★ Optimized battery usage, doesn't drain your battery when your phone is inactive. ★ Fish Aquarium Live Wallpapers support horizontal orientation and look amazing on both mobile phones and tablet devices. ★ Full support for portrait and landscape mode ★ Share this cool app for Android™ on social networks like Facebook, Instagram or Tweeter Deep down in the ocean, water is hiding many wonderful things. This free app will show you that there are many species of fish and sea animals you would certainly like to see. One of the most beautiful is a butterflyfish, with its amazing array of colors and patterns, it is among the most common sites on reefs throughout the world and now it can be a butterfly fish wallpaper on your phone. Just choose which color and pattern you prefer and make it part of your new mobile fish tank. If you like stories about gold fish, just make a wish and very soon you will see a school of gold “fish live wallpaper” on your screen. But if you prefer cartoons, there is a HD wallpaper for you which you cannot resist for sure. Nemo fish or Clownfish wallpaper will beautify your phone with its radiant orange color. Every time you take a phone in your hands you will be reminded of this amazing cartoon and the adventures of the adorably animated water animals. But this is not all you can find. Do you admire them more now? There are more amazing and beautiful things under the sea you should explore. Starfish live wallpaper will show you the beauty of the colors of a seabed and make you come to explore it. Download “Aquarium live wallpaper” free app for Android™ and beautify your Samsung Galaxy phone or tablet and prepare for the summer season and scuba diving. The new world is waiting for you! Dare to dive into fun! *Android™ is a trademark of Google Inc. *This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by Samsung.

description: Nutrition90 is a helpful companion application for anyone undertaking a 90-day extreme fitness program. Keep track of your nutritional intake based on the current phase of the program, as well as your current nutrition level. Also functions as a journal, letting you keep notes for each day of the program along with photos, to give you a visual log of just how well the program is working! The handy history calendar lets you go back to any day and review your nutritional intake, as well as edit those days. You can fill in days you missed, or get caught up if you're already in the program. And with the push of a button, you can email yourself a complete log of your progress at any time! The developers of Nutrition90 are in no way affiliated with Beachbody or Product Partners, LLC, creators of P90X® and other extreme fitness programs.
release_text: New Features: Portion lists are back, now fully customizable! Estimated calories are now shown in Portions and Email Log Fixes: Crash when accessing preferences for days other than the current day Other: Cleaned up the camera code to prevent crashes Cleaned up database code to improve stability

description: # English Vietnamese Dictionary Box (Dict Box) is the hybrid offline Dictionary - Translator - Wordbook app for English Vietnamese / English speakers / learners. # English Vietnamese Dict Box supports looking up words in both Vietnamese and English without switching among dictionaries & languages. # You can tap on a word in English Vietnamese Dict Box to look it up (both English Vietnamese and English supported). # English Vietnamese Dictionary Box supports offline human pronunciation (both English & Vietnamese and even other languages). # English Vietnamese Dict Box searches related images / pictures every time you look up a word. # English Vietnamese Dictionary Box translate your text when it can’t find any results from offline dictionaries. # English Vietnamese Dict Box allows you to install more languages with the app. # English Vietnamese Dictionary Box even supports Stardict format, you can install any Stardict files into Dict Box. # English Vietnamese Dict Box saves your history persistently. # English Vietnamese Dictionary Box helps you to bookmark words to multiple word lists easily. # English Vietnamese Dict Box has built-in Flashcard feature. # English Vietnamese Dictionary box supports import / export your lists to / from Dropbox. # English Vietnamese Dict Box links with other dictionary sites for extra references # And a lot more…

description: ★ THIS APP REQUIRES ROOT! ★ ★ WARNING! ★ Read FAQ before using! http://forum.xda-developers.com/showpost.php?p=37029420&postcount=122 Try FREE version before you buy! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.grilledmonkey.lagfix Warning! This app should only be used by ADVANCED users! If you do not understand what it does - DO NOT USE IT! You can find fstrim() man in Google and more information on XDA - http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2104326 . RTFM before asking any questions or rating this app bad! Some Android users suffer from poor performance after some days/weeks of heavy usage. This is due to a well-known TRIM bug affecting these devices (users report Nexus devices, Samsung Galaxy S3 and HTC One X devices are affected). Kernels with -discard mount option are NOT affected! The source of the problem is that internal storage is not properly TRIMmed when needed. You can find lots of information on XDA - http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1971852 and http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1929021 It is also well-known fact that running fstrim Linux tool from time to time fixes the issue until internal memory runs out of free blocks. Other solutions like mounting with -discard or disabling fsync may be slow or dangerous. LagFix is a user-friendly implementation of fstrim utility. It allows you to select which partitions to trim (you should leave defaults unless you know what you are doing) and run the process easily. Scheduled auto-trim is also available. Please note that fstrim output depends on kernel and device. It works fine unless you see errors. You might see big amounts of bytes, zero amount or repeating amount. All are fine! Read fstrim manual to understand why all these outputs are valid.
release_text: v1.5.1 * Added CWM SuperUser support; * Added android.permission.ACCESS_SUPERUSER permission; * Fixed disabling scheduler; * New notification icons. v1.5 CLEAR APP DATA BEFORE RUNNING! Total app rewrite, dropped RootTools library causing bugs, made my own library for handling root operations.

description: If you like this app please consider the PAID version to help support additional development. Allows easy sharing of images, music, videos and other media to and from your Android powered devices. Send media from your phone directly to your Google TV or other Android devices using Android’s built in “share” function. This is a local transfer and your information is only transmitted to and from your devices. No external server or connections are made. Sending and receiving devices must be on the same local network to initiate transfers. (wired to wireless, wireless to wireless etc....) Setup is as simple as installing Media Share on your Android powered device(s) (including GoogleTV) and checking the “Media transfer enabled”. Receiving Device(s): Install Media Share. Setup your personal encryption key and check the box for media transfer enabled. You should now turn green indicating your ready to accept media. Sending Device(s): Install Media Share. Setup your personal encryption key to match the receiving device. You may exit now unless you would like to enable this device to receive media from other sources also. Transferring images, music, videos and other media is as simple as using Android’s built in “Share” function and selecting “Media Share”. You should see your remote device(s) once you have installed Media Share and have matching encryption keys. Permissions Needed: android.permission.INTERNET Used for transferring images and media. Only local communication is needed. No data is transmitted or received from anything other than your personal devices. android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE Used to save and load your transfered media. android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE Used for allowing transfers to and from devices.
release_text: Version 1.1 - 12/31/2012 ------------------------------------------------------ Feature - can transfer links now Bug Fix - reuse existing app instead of starting new Bug Fix - server would stop on sleep/reboot Bug Fix - server crash when connectivity lost Update - new graphics icon. Update - added youtube video showing usage Thanks, Please report any issues or feedback to support@developersinfo.com

description: Now is the first day of summer and everyone went to the park because it is very hot. While we were walking through the park I noticed a car with ice cream, which until now was not in this place. We thought let's go buy an ice cream as it is very hot outside and we need to cool down. In this game you will prepare ice cream and decorate as you would your clients say, and should be as tasty and as decorated. First you have to choose what kind of ice cream you will, pineapple, grapes, bananas, strawberries, kiwi, watermelon, cantaloupe, pears, apples, cherries, oranges, apricots, nectarines and grapes. After choosing this, we need to prepare the ice cream, put the milk, eggs and a pinch of sugar in a mixer to mix, then add the fruit we chose. Then we have to put the composition in the refrigerator to cool, then we could put in a cone and customer service. After I put it in cones, we can add different pieces of glazured chocolate or topping. Thank you for helping us do this and that you have chosen this wonderful game, and we invite you to choose and other games for girls that will test your skills and will provide skills and creativity to play. Thank you. Instructions: Use your fingers to play

description: Are you in a important place? And do you need to come this place later? "Show The Way" saves your place, detect your address and navigate your saved location. *** And now - you can find your car - automatically! *** Remembers where you parked without any intervention from your side. Just click on the green car icon to find your way back to the car! "Show The Way" features: - Automatic car finder - Find place - Park time (click on saved icon) - Navigate to saved location (draw a path to saved location) - Manuel location (double tap on map) - Photo taking for indoor - Compass - Address detection For any problem don't make comments, please send an e-mail. keywords: GPS, network, navigation, park, car, where is my car, time, direction, maps, save, address, address detection, photo, path, pin. Show The Way (Where is my Car?) Galaxy S2, Galaxy S3, Nexus, HTC One X, Tablets(Nexus 10 ve Note 10.1) Sony Xperia Galaxy Note 2.

~=LIVE WALLPAPER=~ Follow us on Twitter @HardSoftCo! ** Please put screen in Portrait mode before setting wallpaper! Once it is set, you can put it in Landscape! ** Autism Awareness... The puzzle pieces reflects the mystery and complexity of the Autism spectrum. The different colors represent the diversity of the people and families living with the condition. * Show your support for those on the Autism spectrum * Puzzle pieces and sparkles fall from the sky * Designed and programmed by two girls with Asperger's Looks great in Portrait or Landscape. Landscape zooms in and lets you see the animation in greater detail. To see this, please go to your phone's "Display" settings and make sure "Auto-Rotate Screen" is checked. Also, please ensure you are running a third party launcher, as most built-in launchers do not support home screen rotation. Supported launchers include Go Launcher, ADW Launcher, and LauncherPro, all available for free from the Android Market.

description: Relive the glory days again with this revamped version of the ultimate sports game. The Activision Decathlon features all of its legendary events including the long jump, hurdles, javelin, and the all time classic…100 meters! Put your athlete through their paces in single player or go head to head against friends to unlock skills and abilities and reach the top of the podium. CAN YOU BE AN ATHLETICS CHAMELEON? Prove your worth in 10 events! The 100m, 400m, 1500m, 110m Hurdles, Long Jump, High Jump, Pole Vault, Javelin, Shot Put and Discus. TRAIN TO REACH THE STARS As any athlete will tell you, it’s all in the training. Earn stars, coins and skill points from great performance in practise events to level up and progress through the game. SHOP ‘TIL YOU DROP Who said money can’t buy a bit of success? Use your winnings to customise your athlete with more than 30 performance enhancing pieces of gear, training packs and energy supplements. Features: • UPDATED CONTROLS, GRAPHICS AND GAMEPLAY • 8 DECATHLON LEAGUES TO UNLOCK • GO HEAD TO HEAD WITH YOUR FRIENDS IN REAL-TIME MULTIPLAYER COMPETITION • 10 ICONIC TRACK AND FIELD EVENTS TO COMPETE IN Note: This game requires 512MB of internal memory, please ensure you have enough memory before running this game.

description: Take control of a huge Tyrannosaurus (T-Rex) and rampage the city. Smash into cars. Knock over streetlights, mailboxes. Watch water pour out of the Fire Hydrants as you smash into them. Don't worry, this dinosaur does not eat people. He just likes to play around with them. Explore the huge city map with your giant 3D Dinosaur. Be sure and look around in all the corners and uncover all the map secrets. Race against a car, smash into a moving train. Flight will not be fun for this pilot. Find the goats and sheep. This Dinosaur simulator is something you will not want to miss. To extend your play time, find a yummy carrot. Find the airport and hit the airplane right out of the sky. The pilot never saw it coming! Listen for the Train coming down the track. Smash into cars driving on the streets. Special achievements for you to accomplish coming soon. You've tried Wolf Simulator, Bear Simulator, Shark Simulator, and Goat Simulator. Now give Dinosaur Simulator a try!! Its big, its bad, its 3D awesomeness!
